000021.SZ.summary: Shenzhen Kaifa Technology Co., Ltd. provides electronics manufacturing services worldwide. The company manufactures computers and storage products, communication products and consumer electronics, semiconductors, medical equipment, automotive electronics, and commercial and industrial products; and provides packaging and testing services for integrated circuits and semiconductors. It also offers research and development, and production services for automation equipment, utility metering systems, and Internet of Things systems. Shenzhen Kaifa Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1985 and is based in Shenzhen, China.

000066.SZ.long_name: China Greatwall Technology Group Co., Ltd.
000066.SZ.summary: China Greatwall Technology Group Co., Ltd. provides computer components and consumer digital products in China. It also provides PCs/notebooks, tablets, and all-in-one products; power products, such as PC power supply, server power supply, networking power supply, LED power supply, PC adaptor, and power bank products; and servers. The company offers its products for use in infrastructure and solutions, finance, medical care, transportation, education, and other industries. The company was formerly known as China Great Wall Computer Shenzhen Co., Ltd. and changed its name to China Greatwall Technology Group Co., Ltd. in March 2017. The company was founded in 1987 and is based in Shenzhen, China.

000977.SZ.long_name: Inspur Electronic Information Industry Co., Ltd.
000977.SZ.summary: Inspur Electronic Information Industry Co., Ltd. provides data center and cloud computing solutions worldwide. The company offers rack, multi-node, and rack-scale servers; and artificial intelligence, cloud, SAP HANA platform, and hyperconverged infrastructure solutions. It also provides product and technical support services. The company serves government and enterprise customers. Inspur Electronic Information Industry Co., Ltd. is headquartered in Jinan, China.

002104.SZ.summary: Hengbao Co.,Ltd. provides smart products and solutions in China and internationally. The company offers fiscard, e-bank security, WAP security, payment, and platform solutions for banking industry; mobile communication, platform, and mobile payment solutions for telecommunication industry; and social insurance, residents health card, citizen card, and tax control solutions for government sector. It also provides city I pass, ETC card, and transportation permit solutions for the transportation industry; and enterprise I pass, campus I pass, magnetic cards, and IOT products for various industrial applications. The company was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.

002189.SZ.summary: Costar Group Co., Ltd. develops, manufactures, sells, and services optical components and parts in China. It provides various shape and special material optical lens; optical prisms for use in light engine for advanced LCDs, DLPs, and LCOS displays, as well as DVD series prisms and dichroic mirrors; and special type components, such as high-precision optical components for large-diameter super-smooth optical plano-surface and super-smooth optical spherical-surface, as well as high-power laser optical components, aspherical, infrared components, coating products, etc. The company also designs and manufactures various lens assembly, projection lens, monitoring lens, fingerprint device lens, fixed focus projection lens, and zoom projection lens; light engines, including DLP, portable LED, minisize LED embedded type, single and three panel LCOS, large type three-DLP, and laser light engines; and optical auxiliary materials. In addition, it provides mechanical parts; photoresistance cells; and single piece or glued optical low pass filter products used in digital cameras, monitoring systems, digital vidicon, etc. Costar Group Co., Ltd. exports its products to Japan, the United States, Germany, South Korea, Hong Kong, and Taiwan. The company was formerly known as Lida Optical and Electronic Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Costar Group Co., Ltd. in 2019. Costar Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 1995 and is based in Nanyang, China.

002415.SZ.long_name: Hangzhou Hikvision Digital Technology Co., Ltd.
002415.SZ.summary: Hangzhou Hikvision Digital Technology Co., Ltd. provides video-centered intelligent Internet of Things solutions and big data services worldwide. The company offers network cameras, PTZ cameras, explosion-proof and anti-corrosion series products, network video recorders, data center and storage products, and power-over-Ethernet and Wi-Fi kits; and turbo HD cameras, DVRs, PTZ cameras, and portable products. It also provides transmission products, including network switches, cables, and wireless bridges; display and control products, which include digital signages, interactive tablets, monitors, LCD video walls and displays, and controllers; and intelligent traffic products that include signal control and traffic flow systems, smart surveillance and AID systems, entrance and exit management products, checkpoint and intersection violation systems, and parking guidance products. In addition, the company offers access control products comprising face recognition and card terminals, controllers, turnstiles, fingerprint terminals, readers, electrical locks, and kits; video intercom products, 2-wire, 4-wire, 8-wire, and IP products and doorbells; security, thermography, and common vision thermal cameras; alarm products, including intrusion alarm panel, intrusion detector, emergency alarm, and security radar products; CCTV, access control, mobile, traffic, transmission and display, and video intercom product accessories; and HiLook IP, turbo HD, and transmission products. Further, it provides HikCentral Professional, an integrated security software for video security, access control, intrusion alarm, etc.; HikCentral Enterprise; Hik-Connect mobile app; and Hik-ProConnect, a cloud-based solution. It serves the public security, transportation, retail, education, healthcare, financial institutions, intelligent buildings, and other markets. The company was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Hangzhou, the People's Republic of China.

002577.SZ.summary: Shenzhen Rapoo Technology Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells wired and wireless peripheral products worldwide. The company offers wired and wireless mouse and keyboards, wireless audio products, and wired and wireless combo sets. It also provides game peripherals, including game keyboards, mouse, headsets, combos, and mats, as well as gamepads. The company offers its products under the Rapoo brand. The company was founded in 2002 and is based in Shenzhen, China. Shenzhen Rapoo Technology Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of MLK Electronics Limited.

002635.SZ.summary: Suzhou Anjie Technology Co., Ltd. supplies internal and external functional components for the consumer electronics industry in China and internationally. Its principal products include tapes, insulation products, buffering products, EMI products, shading tapes, thermal products, conductive products, optical films, touch panels, cover glasses, precision metal parts, etc. The company also provides die-cut products, non-metal printing and CNC products, 3D processing products, optical glass products, precise metal stampings, and energy batteries. It offers its products for smartphones, tablets, laptops, AR/VR, smart home applications, etc. The company was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Suzhou, China.

002751.SZ.summary: Shenzhen ESUN Display Co.,Ltd engages in the brand terminal exhibition, low carbon cycle exhibition, 3D printing, and virtual reality businesses in China. The company offers brand strategic planning, brand prototype design, brand profile promotion, and business chain terminal research and development services. It also provides 3D printing fundamental research services in 3D maker education, antique 3D digital protection, and Internet e-commerce 3D display fields; and human body, fluid antique 3D, 3D desktop, and face recognition 3D scanners. The company was founded in 2004 and is based in Shenzhen, China.

044380.KS.summary: JOOYONTECH CO., Ltd manufactures, distributes, sells, and services PCs in South Korea. It offers general and gaming desktops; laptops/ tablets, such as slim notebooks, tablets, and mobile devices; gaming laptops and monitors; portable touch monitors; CCTVs; and TVs. The company was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.

06R.SG.summary: Roland DG Corporation manufactures and sells computer peripheral equipment in Japan, Asia, the United States, Europe, and internationally. The company offers wide-format color inkjet printers, inkjet printer/cutters, vinyl cutting machines, 3D milling machines, 3D printers, engraving machines, dental milling machines, dental 3D printers, and photo impact printers. It sells its products under the TrueVIS, monoFab, and DGSHAPE brand names. The company was formerly known as AMDEK Corporation and changed its name to Roland DG Corporation in 1983. Roland DG Corporation was founded in 1981 and is headquartered in Hamamatsu, Japan.

0992.HK.summary: Lenovo Group Limited, an investment holding company, develops, manufactures, and markets technology products and services. It offers commercial and consumer personal computers, as well as servers and workstations; and a family of mobile Internet devices, including tablets and smartphones. The company also provides laptops, desktops, phones, accessories, monitors, ultrabooks, data center solutions, systems, software, server and storage products, networking products, and replacement parts. In addition, it manufactures and distributes IT products, computers, computer hardware, and peripheral equipment; and offers IT, business planning, management, supply chain, finance, administration support, procurement agency, data management solution, intellectual property, investment management, and computer hardware and software systems repair services. Further, the company is involved in the retail and service business for consumer electronic products and related digital services; and development, ownership, licensing, and sale of communications hardware and software. It operates in China, the Asia Pacific, Europe, the Middle East, Africa, and the Americas. The company was founded in 1984 and is based in Quarry Bay, Hong Kong. Lenovo Group Limited is considered as a Red Chip company due to its listing on the Hong Kong Stock Exchange.

117.F.summary: Arista Networks, Inc. develops, markets, and sells cloud networking solutions in the Americas, Europe, the Middle East, Africa, and the Asia-Pacific. The company's cloud networking solutions consist of extensible operating systems, a set of network applications, as well as gigabit Ethernet switching and routing platforms. It also provides post contract customer support services, such as technical support, hardware repair and parts replacement beyond standard warranty, bug fix, patch, and upgrade services. The company serves a range of industries comprising internet companies, service providers, financial services organizations, government agencies, media and entertainment companies, and others. It markets and sells its products through distributors, value-added resellers, system integrators, and original equipment manufacturer partners, as well as through its direct sales force. The company was formerly known as Arastra, Inc. and changed its name to Arista Networks, Inc. in October 2008. Arista Networks, Inc. was incorporated in 2004 and is headquartered in Santa Clara, California.

11W.F.summary: Wacom Co., Ltd. develops, manufactures, and sells electronic devices and related software worldwide. It operates through Branded Business and Technology Solution Business segments. It provides input components and sensor systems to manufacturers of smartphones, tablets, and notebook PCs. The company also offers pen computers, such as MobileStudio Pro; pen displays, including Wacom One, Cintiq 13HD, Cintiq 22HD, Cintiq 22HD touch, Cintiq 27QHD, Cintiq 27QHD touch, Wacom Cintiq, and Wacom Cintiq Pro; pen tablets comprising Wacom Intuos, Wacom Intuos Pro, and Wacom Intuos Pro Paper; and smart pads consisting of Bamboo Slate and Bamboo Folio. In addition, it provides Bamboo Ink, Bamboo Ink Plus, Bamboo Sketch, Bamboo Solo, Bamboo Duo, Bamboo Fineline, and Bamboo Alpha styluses; and apps and services, such as Bamboo Paper, Inkspace, and Wacom Notes. Wacom Co., Ltd. was founded in 1983 and is headquartered in Kazo, Japan.

12DA.F.summary: Dell Technologies Inc. designs, develops, manufactures, markets, sells, and supports Information technology solutions, products, and services worldwide. It operates through three segments: Infrastructure Solutions Group (ISG), Client Solutions Group (CSG), and VMware. The ISG segment provides traditional and next-generation storage solutions; and rack, blade, tower, and hyperscale servers. This segment also offers networking products and services that help its business customers to transform and modernize their infrastructure, mobilize and enrich end-user experiences, and accelerate business applications and processes; attached software and peripherals; and support and deployment, configuration, and extended warranty services. The CSG segment provides desktops, workstations, and notebooks; displays and projectors; attached and third-party software and peripherals, as well as support and deployment, configuration, and extended warranty services. The VMware segment supports and addresses various IT priorities of customers, including accelerating their cloud journey, migrating and modernizing their applications, empowering digital workspaces, transforming networking, and embracing intrinsic security. It enables its customers to digitally transform their operations as they ready their applications, infrastructure, and employees for constantly evolving business needs. This segment also offers cloud-native platform that makes software development and IT operations a strategic advantage for customers. The company also provides information security; cloud software and infrastructure-as-a-service solutions that enable customers to migrate, run, and manage mission-critical applications in cloud-based IT environments; cloud-based integration services; and financial services. The company was formerly known as Denali Holding Inc. and changed its name to Dell Technologies Inc. in August 2016. Dell Technologies Inc. was founded in 1984 and is headquartered in Round Rock, Texas.

1337.HK.summary: Razer Inc., an investment holding company, researches, designs, develops, manufactures, distributes, and sells gaming peripherals, systems, software, services, mobiles, and accessories under the Razer brand in the Americas, Europe, the Middle East, Africa, China, rest of the Asia Pacific. The company operates through four segments: Peripherals, Systems, Software and Services, and Others. It offers peripherals, such as gaming mice, headset, desktop, case, monitor, keyboard, controller, audio device, and mouse mat products, as well as apparel, bags, gear, gaming chair, smart glass, console platform, mobile device, mask, headphone amplifier, microphone, and camera products. The company also provides hardware products, including high-performance gaming peripherals; and Razer Blade gaming laptops. In addition, its software platform includes Razer Synapse, an Internet of Things platform; Razer Chroma RGB, a proprietary RGB lighting technology system; and Razer Cortex, a game optimizer and launcher. Further, the company offers Razer Gold, a game/digital entertainment payment service; and Razer Fintech, an offline-to-online digital payment networks in Southeast Asia. Additionally, it provides airtime electronic pins for prepaid services, reload prepaid credit services, and bill payment services; and electronic pins for online games and other related products; as well as establishes, maintains, and operates payment, clearing and settlement system, and other related activities. The company sells its products through a network of distributors and retailers. Razer Inc. was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Irvine, California.

1471.TW.summary: Solytech Enterprise Corporation manufactures and sells switching power supplies and PC enclosures in Taiwan and internationally. It offers chassis, such as gaming, microATX, slim microATX, mini-ITX, and ATX cases chassis, as well as rackmount chassis; air purification components; and power cords and adapters for RV camp power, marine shore, and generator use. The company also provides cooling products, such as fans; and electric adjustable desk converters and gaming chairs. Solytech Enterprise Corporation was founded in 1982 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

1YH.F.summary: Cibox Inter@ctive develops and sells computer peripherals, connected terminals, and Internet objects. It offers smartphones; tablets and PCs; cloud and storage products; and connected objects, such as smoke, motion, and door detectors, as well as plugs. The company was founded in 1995 and is based in Alfortville, France.

2028.HK.summary: Jolimark Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, manufactures and sells printers and other electronic products in the People's Republic of China and internationally. The company offers rolling and flatbed dot matrix printers, passbook printers, thermal and dot matrix POS solutions, mini printers, tax control ECRs, DLP projectors, and other electronic products under the Jolimark brand name. It also designs, manufactures, and sells business equipment, tax control equipment, and other electronic products on EMS/ODM/OEM basis. In addition, the company is involved in the distribution of EPSON branded SIDM printers; research and development of the inkjet print heads and Internet of Things; and provision of import and export service for electronic business. Further, it operates as a logistics agent. The company was incorporated in 2004 and is headquartered in Jiangmen, the People's Republic of China. Jolimark Holdings Limited is a subsidiary of Kytronics Holdings Limited.

2301.TW.summary: Lite-On Technology Corporation manufactures and markets computer software, hardware, peripherals, and components in Asia and internationally. It also offers monitors, multifunction and all-in-one printers, cameras, and Internet systems and image-processing equipment; information storage and processing equipment, electronic components, and office equipment; electronic coils, transformers, power suppliers, and electronic hardware parts; light-emitting diode products; electronic car products; and optical lens modules and optoelectronic components. In addition, it manufactures and sells medical equipment; photovoltaic devices, electronic components, telecommunications equipment, information technology equipment, semiconductor applications, general lighting, automotive electronics, and renewable energy products and systems; LED optical products; power supplies; image sensors and rectifiers; keyboards, display devices, printers, scanners, and computer cases; system products; mobile terminal equipment; mobile phone molds and assembly lines; power control and energy management products; plastic and computer peripheral products; optical disc drives; modules of automotive recorders; touch panels and rubber assembly products; maintenance equipment and precision instruments; and other electronic components. Further, the company engages in the wholesale, import and export, and installation of street and signal lights, scenery lights, and electronic components; and provision of technology consulting, market research and after-sales, energy technology, ODM, and automotive industry maintenance services. Additionally, it is involved in the electronic contract manufacturing; investment; solar energy engineering; and information outsourcing activities, as well as real estate management business. The company was founded in 1975 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

2305.TW.summary: Microtek International, Inc. produces and sells digital imaging solutions for business, medical, NDT, bio and science, and digital archiving applications in Taiwan and internationally. It offers entry-level and hi-speed flat, ADF, professional photo film, object, large-scale image and document, NDT, gel, and medical film scanners, as well as flatbed scanners, including scanners for books and bound materials. The company also provides X-Ray workstations and digitizers, dental workstations and digitizers, image management software, film digitizing systems, and digital cloud systems. In addition, it offers ScanWizrad Graph, a software for capturing images of large-scale; MiBio, a software for analyzing images designed for the bio-tech analysis and research; and ScanPotter, a document imaging software for Mac OS. Microtek International, Inc. was founded in 1980 and is headquartered in Hsinchu City, Taiwan.

2308.HK.summary: EVOC Intelligent Technology Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the research, development, manufacture, and distribution of special computer products primarily in the People's Republic of China. It operates in two segments, Special Computer Products, and Electronic Products and Accessories; and Property Development. The company offers embedded single board computers (SBCs), including CPU boards, compact modules, micro-ATX SBCs, mini-ITX SBCs, and other SBCs; industrial automation products, such as panel personal computers (PCs) and fanless box PCs; and portable workstations and rugged laptops. It also provides industrial computers comprising wall mount computers, rackmount computers, industrial motherboards, and EPE/EPI CPU cards/backplanes; and applied PC platforms that include rugged computers, power automation, and transportation systems. In addition, the company offers compact PCIs that include CPCI systems, boards, and peripherals; and network appliances, which comprise industrial servers, network platforms, and network modules. Further, it is involved in assembling and trading electronic products and accessories; and the development of properties. The company's products are used in the telecommunication, industrial, military, electricity generation, video frequency control, transportation, Internet, commerce, and finance industries. It sells its products to authorized distribution agents, system integrators, construction and building surveillance agents, software developers, and IT manufacturers. The company was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, the People's Republic of China. EVOC Intelligent Technology Company Limited is a subsidiary of EVOC Hi-Tech. Holding Group Co., Ltd.

2312.TW.summary: Kinpo Electronics, Inc. designs, manufactures, assembles, purchases, and sells consumer electronics, communication, computing, and data storage products worldwide. The company offers 3D printer product lines; storage products; network attached storage products; printer modules and fax machines; wireless and broadband products; set-top-boxes; all-in-one PC and motherboards; formatters, color laser MFPs, laser scan units, and laser printer controllers; and calculators, electronic keyboards, e-dictionaries, gaming mouse and BT joysticks, GPS and GPS modules, auto floor cleaners, photo printers, e-books and tablets, and pachinko displays. It also provides home automation, smartwatch and ring, and fingerprint sensor products; PCBAs for cameras and AV products; LED outdoor and indoor lighting products; PC, server, and storage power supplies, as well as AC/DC adapters, and DC/DC and AC/DC converters; smart grid enabling products and smart power meters; controllers for air condition systems and industrial HVAC boards; automotive body control boards and lightings; and bank teller vault protection systems and high voltage power distribution modules. In addition, the company offers surgical detection systems; green oak leaf, butterhead, green leaf, romaine, red oak leaf, coriander, ice plant, arugula, bughatti oak, and veredes oak; chassis for ATM and gaming machines; plastic parts for printers and plotters, automated chip assembly and medical product parts, and ink cartridges; and precision components. Kinpo Electronics, Inc. was founded in 1973 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

2323.TW.summary: CMC Magnetics Corporation manufactures and distributes optical discs for use in media, electronics, retail, cosmetics, food, liquor, toy, and publishing industries worldwide. It offers DVDs, CDs, and inkjet and thermal printable surface media products; custom packaging solutions, including original CD jewel boxes, CMC slim jewel cases, standard DVD boxes, slim DVD boxes, Blu Ray size DVD boxes, and cake boxes. The company also provides optical media products; and a range of packaging, printing, and sourcing services. In addition, the company engages in film production and distribution; lifestyle retail; property development; food and beverage business; internet service; car rental carrier; digital information supply and general advertising; and general investing business. Further, it manufactures and sells thin film solar cells and solar energy products; cloth dyeing and various textiles; and plastic boxes, cases, baskets, and similar products. The company was founded in 1978 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

2324.TW.summary: Compal Electronics, Inc., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the manufacture and sale of notebook personal computers (PC), monitors, LCD TVs, mobile phones, and various components and peripherals in Taiwan, the United States, China, the Netherlands, the United Kingdom, India, Germany, and internationally. The company operates through Information Technology Product and Strategy Integrated Product Segments. It provides design, development, and manufacturing services for notebooks, ultra slim notebooks, 2 in 1 notebooks, AIO, 5g module and products, tablets, smartphones, wearable and hearable devices, display products, AR/VR devices, home devices, IoT vertical solutions, medical and healthcare products, auto electronics, and servers. The company also engages in the development, manufacture, and sale of information technology and mobile communication products; and research, development, manufacture, and sale of networking products. In addition, it is involved in manufacturing of lighting equipment; international trading; manufacture, wholesale, and retail of medical equipment; rental and leasing; provision of management consulting and biotechnology services; marketing of monitors and notebook PCs; and maintenance and warranty services for notebook PCs and mobile phones; investment; sale of optical disc drives; construction and investment in infrastructure in Ba-Thien industrial district; manufacture and sale of aluminum and magnesium alloy products; provision of training and education, business information consulting, financial and tax consulting, investment consulting, and investment management services; and retail and wholesale of animal medication products. The company was founded in 1984 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

2331.TW.summary: Elitegroup Computer Systems Co.,Ltd. manufactures and supplies various computer products in Taiwan and internationally. It offers motherboards, such as Intel and AMD platform motherboards, and SoC solutions; tablet PCs; all in one, small form factor, LIVA, and PC on stick systems; IPC motherboards and systems; digital signage players and open pluggable specification products; and wireless access points. The company also provides IoT products, including gateways, solution ready platforms, Ai accelerator cards, virtual personal assistants, and smart logistics. In addition, it offers customized computer programming and hardware/software design services. The company was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

2347.TW.summary: Synnex Technology International Corporation, together with its subsidiaries, distributes information technology, communication, consumer product, and semiconductor products. It offers computers, consumer desktop and notebook, telecommunication devices, PC components and peripherals, supplies and accessories, software products, and professional graphics systems, as well as enterprise servers, networks, and storage solutions. The company operates in Taiwan, Mainland China, Hong Kong, Indonesia, Thailand, Vietnam, India, Australia, the United States, Canada, the Middle East, Africa, and internationally. Synnex Technology International Corporation was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

2349.TW.summary: RITEK Corporation manufactures and markets optical storage media products worldwide. The company offers storage media product lines, including optical storage media comprising CDs, DVDs, and Blu-ray discs; electronic storage media, which include flash memory cards, USB flash drives, portable hard disc drives, solid state drives, and others. It also provides solar modules comprising mono and poly-crystalline solar modules; and integrating solar systems; OLED display panels, ITO glasses, and patterned sapphire substrate solutions; metal masks; and biological detection discs. RITEK Corporation was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Hsinchu City, Taiwan.

2352.TW.summary: Qisda Corporation provides ODM/OEM services for electronic products and hardware-software integration for consumer, commercial, industrial, and medical and lifestyle applications Taiwan, the Americas, Mainland China, Poland, Japan, Switzerland, and internationally. It operates through four segments: Brand, Material, Medical, and Design and Manufacturing Service. The company designs, engineers, and manufactures display products, such as LCD monitors, multifunction monitors, all-in-one PCs, broadcasting and medical monitors, graphic and security displays, sign pads, industrial monitors, digital signage displays, digital signage stations, AIO signage products, and interactive e-boards, as well as open frames for gaming/vertical markets. It also offers opto-mechatronics products comprising data, video, short throw, and interactive projectors, as well as IP cameras; imaging devices, including scanners, and multifunctional and color laser printers; mobile communications devices consisting of 4G cameras, projectors, smartphones, industrial and commercial tablets, and mobile POS products; and professional services, which include wireless design, integration, and carrier certification. In addition, the company provides automobile infotainment devices comprising audio/video/navigation systems, infotainment media boxes, automotive displays, automotive BT/WLAN/2G/3G/4G modules, and telemetic communication units; healthcare solutions, such as diagnostic ultrasound, telecare, hemodialyzer, CRRT machine, and IOS equipment; IA solutions, including receipt printers, label printers, currency detectors, POS terminals, and mobile POS and AGV products; and smart solutions and hardware equipment for smart retail, manufacturing, energy, enterprise, school, and healthcare domains. Qisda Corporation was founded in 1984 and is headquartered in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.

2353.TW.summary: Acer Incorporated researches, designs, markets, and services personal computers (PCs), information technology (IT) products, and tablet products in the United States, Mainland China, Taiwan, and internationally. The company offers notebook and desktop PCs, LCD monitors, projectors, servers, gaming products, gadgets, mixed reality devices, cloud services and edge-computing devices, e-business and services, and digital signage solutions. It also provides electronic information, insurance captive, cloud technology, professional seminars and courses, system development and integration, property development, software defined storage, online payment, technical, social networking, cyber security, data center, and real estate services; cloud ticketing systems and electronic books; intelligent transportation and electronic ticketing programs and services; and investment funds. In addition, the company repairs and maintains IT products; researches, designs, and develops Internet of Things platform; sells communication products; operates platform for client service and products sale; and develops Internet of Beings and cloud technology; integrates cloud technology, software, and hardware. Further, it researches, develops, and sells batteries and smart bicycle speedometers; sells commercial and cloud application software and services; and designs, develops, and sells computer software and hardware, as well as provides B2B virtual reality and advisory related services. Acer Incorporated was founded in 1976 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

2354.TW.summary: Foxconn Technology Co., Ltd. produces and sells metal casings, parts, and components. It offers hand-held device casings and related components of devices, including feature phones, smart phones, laptops, tablet computers, consumer electronics, and digital cameras. The company also produces and sells metal parts and related machine components for automobiles and electric vehicles; thermal modules for system products, such as desktop computers, laptops, tablet computers, servers, smart phones, and game consoles; MIM related products; and consumer electronics components, as well as assembles and sells consumer electronics. In addition, it offers portable computer enclosures, mobile phone enclosures, and 3C product enclosures, as well as alloy products. Further, the company is involved in the research, development, manufacture, and sale of computer thermal module, computer components, and aluminum magnesium cases; investment and reinvestment activities; processing electrical board components; and manufacture and marketing of optoelectronics and computer cables, LED lamps and displays, smart light poles and others, computer cases, new alloy material, precision molds, electronic components, and portable computers and its components. Additionally, it researches, develops, produces, and sells aluminum alloy materials, rail vehicle components, car accessories, electronic components, structured metal products, metal containers, automobile parts, power plugs, wall sockets, micro ribbon connectors for terminals, etc., as well as aluminum alloy parts for automobiles and electronics. The company was founded in 1979 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

2356.TW.summary: Inventec Corporation, together with its subsidiaries, develops, manufactures, processes, and trades in computers and related products in Taiwan, the United States, Japan, Hong Kong, Macao, Mainland China, and internationally. The company operates through Core Department and Solar Energy Department segments. It offers personal computing products, including notebook PC, desktop/AIO, and thin client; enterprise system solutions, such as servers, blade servers, network switches, storage equipment, and rack solutions, as well as server management software; and networking solutions. The company also provides smart phones and related devices; industrial mobile systems; cloud services, and soft and hard integration solutions; solar cells; networking solutions; electronic materials and products; and business management services. In addition, it is also involved in the provision of wireless terminal products; assembly and sale of computer products; equipment leasing, storage, and technological development and sale of computers; marketing promotion and telecommunication research activities; and house leasing services. Inventec Corporation was incorporated in 1975 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

2357.TW.summary: ASUSTeK Computer Inc. researches and develops, designs, manufactures, sells, and repairs computers, communications, and consumer electronic products (3C) in Taiwan, China, Singapore, the United States, Europe, and internationally. The company offers phones and accessories, such as power banks, and adapters and cables; gaming products; laptops and two-in-one personal computers (PCs); desktop, tower, mini, stick, and all-in-one PCs, as well as chrome devices; motherboards, single-board computers, and chassis and cooling products; monitors and projectors; headphones and headsets, and sound cards; mesh WiFi systems, wireless routers and adapters, and wired networking products; and graphic cards, as well as business wireless routers and gaming router home products. It also provides computer bags, keyboards and mice, and mouse pads; optical drives and storage products comprising internal and external Blu-rays, and external and internal DVDs; and servers, server motherboards, workstations, and workstation motherboards. Further, it offers Internet information services; maintenance and operating services for information hardware; services information technology and communication products; and leases real estate property. Additionally, the company provides ink-jet print heads and digital image output technology, high-speed analog circuits, integrated circuits, industrial and medical computers, interface cards, and medical robots; invests in computer peripheral, Internet service, and automotive electronics businesses; and researches, develops, sells, and consults information system software; provides marketing support and repair services for medical computers and peripherals. ASUSTeK Computer Inc. was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

2362.TW.summary: Clevo Co. operates as an ODM/OEM manufacturer worldwide. The company provides hardware solutions for notebooks, tablets, and all-in-one PCs. It offers products for gaming, entertainment, and mobility applications. The company was founded in 1983 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

2364.TW.summary: Twinhead International Corp. provides rugged notebooks, rugged tablets, embedded solutions, and vehicle mount computers worldwide. It offers mobile computers; rugged tablet PCs; semi-rugged mobile computers; mobile thin clients; medical tablet PCs; and other customized mother boards/systems. The company also provides ODM, and partial or full customization services; project management services; manufacturing services comprising fully rugged product and special feature validations, flexible production system, supply chain management, and purchasing models; and certification application services. It serves government, military, health care, field sales/insurance, public safety, retail, hospitality, transportation/distribution, utilities/oil and gas, communication, agriculture, and field service industries. The company was founded in 1984 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

2365.TW.summary: KYE Systems Corp. provides computer and mobile device peripherals. It offers mouse, mouse pads, keyboards, stylus, earphones, speakers, digital cameras, headsets, and gaming peripherals. The company was founded in 1983 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

2380.TW.summary: Avision Inc. designs, manufactures, and markets a variety of scanners and components for multi-function products worldwide. The company offers document, flatbed, network, and intelligent/portable scanners, as well as multi-function peripherals and paper air series. Avision Inc. was founded in 1991 and is headquartered in Hsinchu, Taiwan.

2382.TW.summary: Quanta Computer Inc., together with its subsidiaries, engages in manufacturing, processing, and selling laptop computers in the United States, Mainland China, the Netherlands, Japan, and internationally. The company offers notebook PCs; servers, including high level blade servers, rack servers, server motherboards, LAN cards, storage, networking switches, etc.; IoT products; HD encoding cameras; and industrial computers. It also designs and manufactures wireless communication products, including mobile phones, tablets, wearable products, smart speakers, and other smart home products; wireless devices and modules for system integrators and end uses, such as SiP modules for handheld devices, PCI-E modules for notebook computers, mini-PCI modules for embedded applications, and Card bus cards and USB dongles for end users; and multimedia products comprising home gateway, IP-STB, DMA, and audio products. In addition, the company designs, manufactures, and markets global positioning system (GPS) products, including GPS engine boards, GPS mouse, Bluetooth GPS, GPS data loggers, GPS speed camera detectors, personal navigation assistance, and Pico projectors, as well as wireless communications and software solutions. Further, the company offers datacenter products and services that include storage, network switches, integrated rack systems, and cloud solutions; and planning, installation, and implementation of factory automation, as well as engineering, integration, and optimization services. Quanta Computer Inc. was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Taoyuan, Taiwan.

2385.TW.summary: Chicony Electronics Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells keyboards and other computer peripheral components in Taiwan and internationally. It offers input devices, including ergonomic, wired entry, wired multimedia, 2.4G wireless combo, Bluetooth, and smart card keyboards; mobile keyboards; and camera modules. The company also provides video image products, such as action cams, dash cams, outdoor IP cams, and zoom camcorders, as well as wearable cams and porch IP cams; and automotive electronic, such as image systems and LED lighting products. In addition, it manufactures sells switching power supplies and other electronic parts; researches, manufactures, and sells DSL bridges and routers; Internet solution for E-Commerce solution; production and sells automotive and motorcycle components, electric machine and device, lamps, and plastic products; researches and develops, manufactures, sells, and installs electric machinery, electric frequency device, and industry automation equipment, as well as offers aftersale and advisory services; manufactures and sells electrical machinery and components; and imports and exports goods. Chicony Electronics Co., Ltd. was founded in 1983 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

2387.TW.summary: Sunrex Technology Corporation manufactures and sells laptop computer keyboards worldwide. It is also involved in the research and development of various human interface devices, including keyboards/mice for desktop computers, writing tablets, and presentation devices; and production of tablet computers and AIO-related peripheral products. In addition, the company offers wireless keyboard and mouse, HTPC multimedia keyboards, leather casing keyboards for tablet computers, touch controlled keyboards, gaming keyboards, and mice, as well as 3D air keyboards and mice. Sunrex Technology Corporation was founded in 1975 and is headquartered in Taichung, Taiwan.

2395.TW.summary: Advantech Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells embedded computing modules, industrial automation products, and applied and industrial computers worldwide. The company operates through Industrial Internet of Thing Services, Embedded Board and Design-in Services, Allied Design Manufacture Services, Intelligent Services, and Global Customer Services segments. It offers computer on modules, digital signage players, edge AI and Internet of Things solutions, embedded PCs and single board computers, embedded software, fanless embedded computers, gaming platform solutions, industrial display systems, industrial flash and memory solutions, industrial and semi-industrial motherboards, and RISC computing platforms. The company also provides automation controllers, building automation systems, certified solutions, embedded automation computers, human machine interfaces, machine automation, panel PCs, power and energy, and remote I/O and wireless sensing modules, as well as WebAccess software and Edge SRP. In addition, it offers data acquisition and communication, modular IPC, and slot SBC and backplanes; industrial computer chassis, computer peripherals, motherboards, and servers and storage; transportation systems, and video platforms; and healthcare infotainment terminals, and intelligent power systems, as well as medical carts, computers, and tablets. Further, the company provides intelligent connectivity solutions; networks and communication solutions; intelligent logistics and retail solutions; applied computing platforms; investment and management services; and product design services, as well as produces and sells POS systems, electronic parts, LCD touch panels, USB cables, automation vehicles and related products. Advantech Co., Ltd. was founded in 1981 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

2399.TW.summary: Biostar Microtech International Corp. engages in the design, manufacture, and sale of add-on cards, and multi-media and system products in Taiwan and internationally. The company offers motherboards, SSD and SOC products, mini PCs, keyboards/mouse, VGA and IPC products, crypto mining motherboards, and accessories. It also provides accessories, such as cables, headsets, brackets, dongles, power cables, bridges, IO shields, and other products. The company was founded in 1986 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

2405.TW.summary: Shuttle Inc. designs, manufactures, and sells small form factor computers and accessories worldwide. It offers XPC computers consisting of consumer and commercial products, including cube mini-towers, slim, nano, and all-in-one PCs; and facial recognition devices for access control, digital signage players, and PCs to drive kiosk applications, as well as digital signage media players, notebook computers, and tablets. The company also provides software development services for digital education and home automation applications; SMARTVILLE smart living solutions; original design manufacturer products, such as notebooks, netbooks, 2-in-1 devices, tablets, etc.; and HOCA, a digital management system designed for in-home-care service for seniors. In addition, it operates EDUPAL, a paperless online learning platform that offers curriculum writing and assessments. The company offers its products through a network of resellers, partners, and suppliers. Shuttle Inc. was founded in 1983 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

2406.TW.summary: Gigastorage Corporation operates in the optoelectronics industry in Taiwan. The company manufactures and sells photovoltaic (PV) multi-crystalline wafers; and researches, develops, and manufactures PV ribbons, as well as provides PV modules. It also develops low-temp die attach paste for use in the packaging process for the electronics; and energy industries, including LED, thin-film-base PV cells, T/P, passive component termination, etc. In addition, the company provides biotech materials, such as blood glucose strip conductive Ag paste and carbon paste. Further, it offers PV systems comprising system construction and electric power selling services that consist of evaluation, suggestion, design, application, bid tendering in Bureau of Energy, manufacturing, facility registration, etc. Additionally, the company provides ground type solar power stations, as well as roof type solar power stations for private houses, public-owned buildings and factory buildings, and cottages; and PCB/BGA milling cutter and drill coating products, such as coated milling cutters and drills. Gigastorage Corporation was founded in 1997 and is based in Hukou, Taiwan.

2414.TW.summary: Unitech Computer Co., Ltd. provides information technology products in Taiwan. The company offers digital goods, computer host products, monitors, computer peripherals, printing equipment, consumable supplies, Internet goods, computers, monitoring equipment, network cameras, and computer assemblies, as well as enterprise solutions. The company was incorporated in 1979 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan.

2417.TW.summary: AVerMedia Technologies, Inc. designs, manufactures, and markets multimedia, Internet TV, and consumer electronic products worldwide. It provides PC, tablet, and mobile TV-viewing solutions, as well as high-definition video and real-time audio-visual products. The company also offers software development kit, frame grabber, video test equipment, audio and video doorbell, and encoder. In addition, it designs carrier boards, embedded systems, and application-ready platforms. The company's products are applied in gaming and live streaming, education, and business applications. AVerMedia Technologies, Inc. was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

2425.TW.summary: Chaintech Technology Corporation operates in the mainboard and graphics card markets in Taiwan and China. The company provides graphics cards for NVIDIA and AMD chips; mainboards based on Intel and AMD chipsets; cases and power supplies under the Segotep brand; and tablets under the Colorfly brand. It also engages in the research and development, manufacture, and trading of electronic products, computer hardware, peripheral devices, display cards, and motherboards, as well as general investment business. The company offers its products and services through online distributors and e-commerce platforms, as well as through traditional channels. The company was formerly known as Walton Chaintech Corporation and changed its name to Chaintech Technology Corporation in 2013. Chaintech Technology Corporation was founded in 1986 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

2451.TW.summary: Transcend Information, Inc. engages in the manufacturing, processing, and sale of computer software and hardware, peripheral equipment, and other computer components worldwide. The company provides solid state drives; dashcams and accessories; body cameras and accessories; external storage products, such as portable hard drives, desktop external hard drives; memory cards, such as SD and micro SD cards, and compact flash drives; USB flash drives; desktop, laptop, Macbooks, and server and workstation memory modules; multimedia products, including digital music players and DVD writers; and card readers and accessories, as well as apple solutions. In addition, the company provides embedded solutions, such as SATA, PATA, Half-Slim, and mSATA SSD products; PATA and USB flash modules; memory cards, such as SD, microSD, compact flash, CFast 2.0, and MMC cards; and DRAM module solutions, as well as customized logo printing and content preloading services. Its products are used in embedded, gaming, transportation, healthcare, server, automation, and military industries. Transcend Information, Inc. was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

2465.TW.summary: Leadtek Research Inc. develops, manufactures, and sells graphics cards worldwide. The company offers virtual desktop systems, including zero and thin clients, management console, hardware accelerator, and remote workstation card; graphics cards; professional graphics; AI and performance computing, including development kits, virtualization, AI deep learning systems, and data center accelerator; and workstation and servers. It also provides computer and medical products; global positioning system (GPS) products comprising GPS smart antennas and industrial OEM modules; and GPU docker management systems and AI software. The company was founded in 1986 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

2480.TW.summary: Stark Technology, Inc. provides system integration services for information and communication technology products in Taiwan. It offers systems integration services in the areas of infrastructure, peripheral, enterprise network, application software, and telecom, as well as professional, implementation, and consulting and maintenance services. The company also provides information security services, such as network and content security; and services for enterprise, hi-tech, FSI, telecom, and public sector industrial applications. It serves customers in the financial services, education and research, high tech manufacturing, electronics, communications, transportation and automotive, healthcare and hospitality, and other industries, as well as to the government. Stark Technology, Inc. was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Hsinchu City, Taiwan.

2495.TW.summary: Infortrend Technology, Inc provides enterprise data storage solutions worldwide. The company offers EonStor CS, a shared storage solution to enterprises and businesses; EonStor GSa, a flash unified storage solution; EonStor GSc, a hybrid cloud storage appliance; EonStor GS, a unified storage integrating storage area network (SAN), network attached storage, and cloud services; EonStor GSe, a shared media storage for SMB; EonStor GSe Pro, a single controller storage solution; and M and E, and office shared storage solutions . It also provides EonStor DS, a SAN storage solution; EonServ, an integrated storage server solution; expansion enclosure for rackmount storage systems; and EonOne for GS and CS, a storage management tool. In addition, the company offers data services, including SSD Cache, a component that stores data so that future requests for the data can be served; automated storage tiering solutions; local/remote replication for data protections and backups; and Snapshot, which provides point-in-time copies of data for various applications, including backup, testing or development, information analysis, and data mining. Further, it offers thin provisioning technology to enhance storage utilization; intelligent drive recovery for RAID protections and data recoveries, and media scan; and network video recorders for surveillance deployment in offices. Additionally, the company provides storage solutions for virtualizations, hybrid cloud, artificial intelligence, private cloud, physical securities, backup and disaster recoveries, virtual desktop infrastructures, databases, and dockers, as well as high performance computing solutions. It serves security and surveillance, media and entertainments, education and academics, financial services, and healthcare industries, as well as the government and public sectors. The company was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

24T.F.summary: Tobii AB (publ) develops and sells eye-tracking technology and solutions in Sweden, Europe, the United States, Canada, Asia/Oceania, and internationally. It operates through three segments: Tobii Dynavox, Tobii Pro, and Tobii Tech. The Tobii Dynavox segment offers augmentative and alternative communication solutions, such as eye-controlled communication devices, touch screen controlled communication devices, and computer accessories for access and eye control for spinal cord injuries, cerebral palsy, ALS, and other medical conditions. The Tobii Pro segment provides eye-tracking hardware, and analytics software solutions, as well as market research services that are used by companies and research institutions. The Tobii Tech segment offers eye-tracking integration solutions in the areas of consumer electronics and other products, such as personal computers, virtual reality headsets, healthcare applications, and others. The company offers its products through resellers, agents, and distributors. Tobii AB (publ) was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Danderyd, Sweden.

300042.SZ.summary: Netac Technology Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells flash memory products in the People's Republic of China and internationally. It offers USB flash drives, portable HDD and solid state disks, memory cards, and encryption products. The company was founded in 1999 and is based in Shenzhen, the People's Republic of China.

300223.SZ.summary: Ingenic Semiconductor Co.,Ltd., a fabless technology company, designs embedded CPU products for mobile and consumer system-on-chip applications in China. The company offers solutions for wearables and consumer devices markets, which cover smart Internet of things, smart videos, smart wearables, and CPU technology products. Its products are used in biometrics, e-education, portable media player, e-reader, and mobile Internet devices. Ingenic Semiconductor Co.,Ltd. was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.

300302.SZ.summary: Toyou Feiji Electronics Co., Ltd. provides data storage infrastructure solutions in China. The company offers flash memory, autonomous and controllable, cloud computing, enterprise and distributed storage, storage network, and data protection products. It also provides video cloud, active storage, and database acceleration solutions. The company serves finance, transportation, medical, education, and energy industries, as well as government, military, industrial, and research institutes. Toyou Feiji Electronics Co., Ltd. was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.

3005.TW.summary: Getac Technology Corporation, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the research, development, manufacture, and sale of various information products in China, the United States, Europe, and internationally. The company provides notebooks, printer and its components, DVDs, mobile phones, digital cameras, PCBs, personal computers, communication equipment, automobile electronic devices, precision dies, casting/forging raw parts for automobiles and motorcycles, and magnesium alloy castings, as well as engages in the wholesale and retail of data management, software, electronic equipment, and mold related and e-communication products. It also offers various mechanical solutions, such as engineering design, prototyping and pilot run, tooling, and mass production and assembly services of plastic and metal stamping parts and modules; aluminum alloy and magnesium alloy automotive die-cast parts; and fasteners for aerospace and high-end industrial applications. In addition, the company provides repair and maintenance, and technical services for computers and related products; and sells smart mobile monitoring solutions. Further, it operates as an agency of domestic/foreign freight transport and import/export declaration, and import/export trade. Its products are used in military and industrial computer system applications. The company was formerly known as MiTAC Technology Corporation and changed its name to Getac Technology Corporation in 2009. Getac Technology Corporation was incorporated in 1989 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan. Getac Technology Corporation operates as a subsidiary of MiTAC-SYNNEX Group.

300645.SZ.summary: Zhejiang Zhengyuan Zhihui Technology Co.,Ltd. provides system construction, operation and maintenance, intelligent management, and control of smart card related services to schools, government, and military police in China. It offers cards, intensive cards, and freestanding card platforms; basic and online education platform in the school; and card application subsystems, operation platforms, payment and self-service terminals, IC card readers, remote identification products, and visitor channels. The company also provides hacking and communication controlling products. In addition, it offers electronic payment, identification, access control, and attendance, as well as energy-saving and smart home products. The company is headquartered in Hangzhou, China.

300647.SZ.summary: Shenzhen Fluence Technology PLC. researches and develops, produces, and sells radiators, heat sinks, and LED lights in China and internationally. The company offers LED lighting products, including sports, education, facade, solar, infrastructure, industrial facilities, commercial, and household lightings. It also provides consumer electronics, such as radiators, storage devices, memory products, power supply devices, computer accessories, and cases; and flood light, highbay light, street light, and tunnel light heatsinks. In addition, the company offers heat dissipation systems comprising medical equipment cooling solutions; generating set and transportation solutions; aerospace and military testing equipment; and IDC data center and cloud computing centers. Further, it provides smart city solutions for transportation, humanities scenic spots, education facilities, and other fields. Shenzhen Fluence Technology PLC. was founded in 2005 and is based in Shenzhen, China.

300787.SZ.summary: Anfu CE LINK Limited manufacturers and sells custom-made Cables and accessories for AV, PC, and mobile applications in Mainland China. The company offers a range of cables and adapters, and smart wireless accessories, as well as power related products, including USB power stations power banks travel and car chargers, wireless charging products, and inverters. It also provides AV distribution products, such as HDMI matrix, switcher, splitter, converter, and extender products; HDBaseT and AV/USB extenders; and AV matrix, switcher, splitter/hub, and converter products. The company is based in Ji'an, China.

3013.TW.summary: Chenming Electronic Technology Corporation, an OEM/ODM manufacturer, engages in the production and sale of computer and server chassis, mobile device components, and related components. The company also produces desktop, server, and notebook subsystems; and metal injection molding products. Its products are used for the assembly and protection of desktop PCs, handheld devices, and servers. The company was formerly known as Chenming Mold Ind. Corp. and changed its name to Chenming Electronic Technology Corporation in January 2020. Chenming Electronic Technology Corporation was founded in 1970 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

3021.TW.summary: Welltend Technology Corporation produces and sells electronic components and wire connectors in Taiwan and internationally. Its products are used in automotive electronics, automation equipment, computers and servers, consumer electronics, and smart appliances. The company also offers information system integration and consulting services. In addition, it provides life science and technology products, and life style shaping products. The company was founded in 1973 and is based in Taipei City, Taiwan.

3022.TW.summary: IEI Integration Corp. provides industrial computer products worldwide. It provides AIoT and edge computing products, DevCloud solutions, PUZZLE Dev. Kits, FLEX AIoT developer kits, TANK AIoT developer kits, AIoT edge insights solutions, embedded systems, AI training server systems, VPU, FPGA, and CPU accelerators, backplanes, and assistant robots; networking products comprising network appliances, including routers, VPN, switches, firewalls, UTMs, etc.; and storage servers, network modules, and industrial network switches. The company also offers embedded computers consisting of full size and half size single board computers; industrial motherboards and embedded boards; ETX/COM EXPRESS/Q7; PEMUX series backplanes; rackmount, embedded, and compact chassis; LCD converter boards; PCI/PCIe expansion cards; and wireless, mini-PCIe, and TPM modules. In addition, it provides embedded systems, including AI-powered box PCs, DIN-rail embedded systems, rugged box PCs, compact size embedded systems, medical box PCs, transportation embedded systems, digital signage embedded systems, and QTS gateways, as well as rackmount, embedded, and compact chassis; panel PC and monitor products, such as heavy and light industrial, RISC-based, healthcare, and transportation PCs; industrial monitors; and handheld devices. Further, the company offers power supply products, adapters, DC UPS modules, DC to DC modules, and peripherals, such as industrial compact flash cards, CPU coolers, cables and connectors, mounting kits and stands, drive bays, and e-window tool kits. Its products are used in computer-based applications, such as factory automation, computer telephony integration, networking appliances, security, and systems, as well as in various fields comprising the Internet of Things, national defense, police administration, transportation, communication base stations, and medical instruments. IEI Integration Corp. was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

3032.TW.summary: Compucase Enterprise Co., Ltd. designs and manufactures LED drivers, PC cases, power supplies, rackmount chassis, cabinets, LED luminaire, and LED panels worldwide. The company offers its products under the HEC brand to OEM customers, system integrators, industrial users, and retail customers. Compucase Enterprise Co., Ltd. was founded in 1979 and is headquartered in Tainan City, Taiwan.

3046.TW.summary: Aopen Inc. provides digital signage technologies in Taiwan. It offers embedded PCs, digital signage commercial PCs, medical PCs, digital signage media players, video wall controllers, chrome boxes, AOPEN intelligent control unit (AiCU), and panel computers; antimicrobial PCs; conference cameras; and mobile, palm-sized, capsule, and smart projectors. The company also provides gaming, consumer, and commercial monitors; gaming gadgets, such as gaming keyboard, mouse, RGB light stick, and display stand; and accessories, including wall mount, floor and table stand, card reader and scanner, screen protector, and WiFi/USB display solution. It serves retail, enterprises, industrial environments, healthcare, government, hospitality and leisure, QSR, finance/ banking, transportation, education, gaming, and entertainment industries. The company was founded in 1996 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

3054.T.summary: HYPER Inc. engages in the sale and installation setting/maintenance of computers and peripheral equipment in Japan. It also sells, installs, and maintains communication, office, and office automation equipment; plans, develops, and sells software; and provides information processing services. In addition, the company is involved in the planning and production of Websites; Internet mail ordering business; and network construction and system maintenance services. HYPER Inc. was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

3057.TW.summary: Promise Technology, Inc. develops storage solutions for the data center, surveillance, cloud, and rich media markets worldwide. The company offers VTrak storage appliances for multi-user collaboration to ingest, edit, stream, and process rich media; Vess storage appliances for IP video surveillance installations; and Apollo Cloud, a cloud to store and share photos and videos through phones, tablets, or laptops. It also provides Pegasus, a Thunderbolt 3 RAID storage solution for creative enthusiasts and professionals; and SANLink, a Thunderbolt bridge adapter, which eliminates bottlenecks through the introduction of fiber channel or 10 Gb Ethernet connectivity. In addition, the company offers solutions, including consumer/IoT, rich media, surveillance, and IT and ODM solutions, as well as professional services comprising warranties, onsite hardware replacement, technical training, and installation services. Promise Technology, Inc. was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Hsinchu City, Taiwan.

3078.TWO.summary: Channel Well Technology Co.,Ltd. manufactures and sells power supply products worldwide. It offers PC and IPC power supply, industrial power supply, wireless charging transmitter and receiver, LED lighting driver/power, enclosed switching power, and open frame power products, as well as telecom power systems, wireless chargers/power banks, adapters, USB chargers, power cables/electronic wires, magnetic components, heat sinks, and electric vehicle chargers. The company was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.

3088.TWO.summary: Axiomtek Co., Ltd. designs, manufactures, and sells PC-based industrial computer products and peripherals worldwide. The company offers industrial PCs, single board computers, system on modules, fanless and rugged embedded systems, intelligent transportation systems, industrial Internet of Things gateway, industrial EtherCAT master solution, touch panel computers, medical panel computers, digital signage solutions, and network appliances products. It also provides road application platform, digital electronic signage, transportation application platform, industrial Internet of Things gateway, touch tablets, etc. The company's products are used in industrial automation, outdoor information booths, renewable energy, traffic control, shipbuilding, medical care, and other application markets. In addition, it develops software packages for AMS smart remote monitoring programs and data collection used in smart factories, smart energy, green energy, and other industries; and cloud application server and network security application platform products for future big data cloud applications. Axiomtek Co., Ltd. was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

3171.TWO.summary: Xin Chio Global Co., Ltd. engages in the sale of packaging materials. It provides tapes, electronic packaging materials, buffer packaging materials, plastic bags, packaging machines, paper packaging products, and others. The company is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

3213.TWO.summary: Mildef Crete Inc. develops, manufactures, and sells computer systems worldwide. It provides notebook, tablet, and handheld PCs. The company was founded in 1990 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

3217.TWO.summary: Argosy Research Inc. produces and sells electronic connectors and system products. The company's products include electronic connectors, such as USB3.1 type-C, DDR3/4/5, M.2(NGFF), mini PCIe, LVDS, RF coaxial, battery, FAKRA, etc.; antenna and nut metal stamping parts; and injection/molding parts. Argosy Research Inc. was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Hsinchu City, Taiwan.

3231.TW.summary: Wistron Corporation, together with its subsidiaries, provides design, manufacturing, testing, and after-sales service for information and communication technology products. The company engages in the research, development, design, manufacture, testing, and sale of desktop computers, notebook computers, motherboards, servers, system platforms, high-speed and multi-function multiple-CPU computer systems, multi-media computers, network computers, consumer-type computers and special computers, microprocessors, CD-ROMs, PDAs, panel PCs, pocket computers and interface cards. The company also offers video and Internet telephones, video conferencing equipment, and telecommunication equipment; digital satellite TV receivers, set-top boxes, digital video decoders, and multi-media appliance products; digital cameras, CD-ROM drives, and DVD-ROM drives; wireless receiver products comprising mobile phones, wireless LAN cards, and Bluetooth communication modules; and LCD TVs and other electronic audio and visual products. In addition, it is designs and merchandises computer software and programs; recycles electronic waste; and offers in vitro diagnostic devices, physiological signal diagnostic devices, and medical date systems. Further, the company is involved in the manufacturing, processing, and selling of electronic products for automobiles; maintenance and cleaning of electronics products; and import and export trade operations. It operates in the United States, China, Europe, and internationally. The company was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

3324.TWO.summary: Auras Technology Co., Ltd. engages in manufacturing, processing, and retailing electronic materials, computer heat dissipation modules, and other related products in China, Taiwan, Korea, Ireland, and internationally. The company offers coolers, heat sinks, cooling modules, heat pipes, fans, etc. primarily for applications in notebooks, desktops, servers, pads and workstations, mobiles, graphic cards, etc. It also provides server, motherboard, and graphics card cooling modules; all-in-one workstations and DVD player cooling modules; and cooling products for home appliances, such as DVD and Blu-ray players, as well as LED lighting applications. In addition, the company offers heat flow consulting services. Auras Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

3336.HK.summary: Ju Teng International Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, manufactures and sells casings for notebook computer and handheld devices in the People's Republic of China and internationally. The company is involved in mold development, plastic injection, metal stamping, die-casting/thixo-molding, CNC machining, composite casing, and surface coating and assembly activities. It also manufactures and sells moulds and materials; sells computer equipment and peripherals, and casings related materials; and provides general administrative and support services. The company serves notebook computer manufacturers and brand owners. Ju Teng International Holdings Limited was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Central, Hong Kong.

3349.TWO.summary: Dexin Corporation manufactures and sells IT cordless solutions and high-level devices in Taiwan. The company offers audio and entertainment products, including Bluetooth headsets and speakers, gaming headsets, and audiophile headphones; and computer peripherals and consumer electronic devices, such as office and gaming mouse products, keyboards, and game controllers. It also provides industrial design, research and development, product engineering and manufacturing, and other custom and project design services. Dexin Corporation was founded in 1997 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

3396.HK.summary: Legend Holdings Corporation, an diversified investment holding company, together with its subsidiaries, operates in information technology (IT), financial services, innovative consumption and services, agriculture and food, advanced manufacturing and professional services, and financial investments businesses in the People's Republic of China and internationally. The company's IT segment develops, manufactures, and markets technology products and services to customers and enterprises. Its Financial Services segment offers banking, short-term financing, financial leasing, insurance brokerage, third party payment, internet finance, property insurance, and other related business services. The company's Innovative Consumption and Services segment provides medical and health services, car rental business, and education services for kids. Its Agriculture and Food segment plants and sells fruit and tea products; produces and sells salmon and Chinese liquor; supplies seafood and accessory products; and operates liquor direct sales chain business. The company's Advanced Manufacturing and Professional Services segment provides chemicals and energy materials production; and logistics, and aviation logistic related business services. Its Financial Investments segment invests in private equity and venture capital funds as a limited partner; holds interest in the general partners of various funds; makes angel investments in technology start-ups, as well as minority investments in other entities; and provides office rental services. The company also develops car management software; provides car services information consultant and medical consultation services; and engages in real estate investment and asset management businesses. In addition, it engages in agriculture and food investment; foods trading activities; and offers other animal protein-related products. The company was incorporated in 1984 and is headquartered in Beijing, the People's Republic of China.

3406.TW.summary: Genius Electronic Optical Co.,Ltd, an optical technology company, designs, develops, and sells lenses in Taiwan. It offers mobile lenses; and VR/AR and automotive optics. The company was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Taichung, Taiwan.

3434.TWO.summary: ACULA Technology Corp. provides video solutions and services in Taiwan and internationally. It offers closed-circuit television (CCTV) monitors; combo DVR/NVR products; medical displays; IP monitors with POE; IP public view monitors with POE; industrial monitors-touch monitors/point of sale (POS); digital signage/public information display products; and high-brightness monitors. The company also provides OEM/ODM display products. It offers CCTV products for use in apartment complexes, airports, bars, casinos, daycares, schools, parks, fast food restaurants, hotels, night clubs, parking lots, office buildings, shopping malls, train/bus stations, and warehouses, as well as for home owners; and POS products for food service, hospitality, retail, and public markets. The company was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.

3479.TWO.summary: Avalue Technology Inc. designs, manufactures, and sells embedded computing solutions in Taiwan and internationally. The company offers industrial and embedded motherboards; industrial PC/computers, such as embedded, transportation, rackmount, and ARM based systems; and panel PCs, including industrial, medical, and open frame panel PCs, as well as industrial touch monitors, audio and video extenders, peripherals and accessories, and panel and touch technologies. It also provides computer-on-module products for critical or industrial applications; point of sale (POS) terminals, which includes desktop and compact POS; medical tablets, and semi rugged tablet and accessories; device management software; E ink solutions, such as public display, healthcare IoT, and E ink technologies solutions; ODM services; and intelligent solutions. The company's products are used in healthcare, retail, gaming, manufacturing, and transportation applications. Avalue Technology Inc. was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

3494.TW.summary: HiTi Digital, Inc. manufactures and supplies digital photo products and services in Taiwan and internationally. The company offers industrial, commercial, and consumer photo printers; card printers; order station/operation console products; print kit/consumables; and printer accessories. It also provides professional image software designed for passport/ID photo format. The company was formerly known as Hi-Touch Imaging Technologies Co., Ltd. and changed its name to HiTi Digital, Inc. in 2007. HiTi Digital, Inc. was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

3515.TW.summary: ASROCK Incorporation primarily manufactures and sells motherboards in Taiwan and internationally. It also offers graphics cards, networking products, mini and industrial PCs, and server/WS products. The company was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

3521.TWO.summary: DataVan International Corporation provides POS solutions worldwide. The company offers POS terminals, embedded box PCs, touch monitors, touch systems, kiosks, and POS peripherals comprise cash drawers, thermal printers, and system attachments. It offers solutions for the retail and foodservice industries. The company was founded in 1986 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

3535.TW.summary: Favite Inc. engages in the research, development, and manufacture of automatic optical detection and testing equipment. It offers panel display detection devices, semiconductor inspection equipment, PCB detection devices, automatic defect classification determination systems, and rate management systems for OLED displays, touch panels, cameras, and chromicity/film thickness/OD products, as well as automatic optical CD measurement equipment. Favite Inc. was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Zhubei, Taiwan.

3540.TWO.summary: Thermaltake Technology Co., Ltd. provides entertainment, e-sports, technology, and lifestyle products worldwide.
