It offers cases, power supplies, and coolers under the Thermaltake brand; keyboards, headsets, mice, and accessories under the Tt eSPORTS brand name; and mobile accessories under the LUXA2 brand. The company also operates an e-shopping site under the Tt Buy brand name. It serves its customers through distributors and retailers. The company was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

3564.TWO.summary: AEWIN Technologies Co.,Ltd. provides network platform products and solutions in Taiwan and internationally. The company offers network appliances; general purpose and edge computing servers, and workstation products; network expansion modules; and other modules, as well as provides ODM/OEM services. Its products are used for network computing, software-defined wide area network, network functions virtualization infrastructure, multi-access edge computing/edge AI, and 5G/vRAN applications. The company was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

3638.HK.summary: Huabang Financial Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, engages in the computer and peripheral products in Hong Kong and the People's Republic of China. It operates through Computer and Peripheral Products Business; Financial Services Business; and Money Lending Business segments. The company assembles and trades in electronic components and products. It also provides initial public offering, fund raising, financial advisory, underwriting and placing, securities brokerage, and money lending services. In addition, the company offers full brokerage services in securities trading, clearing, IPO subscription, shares custody, and nominee services, as well as shares margin financing for individual and corporate investors; lends money to high net worth corporations or individual borrowers who possess stocks of listed companies or real estate properties; and offers custom-made comprehensive financing plans. Further, it is involved in the equity, debt/bond, and mezzanine investments; and property holding businesses. The company was formerly known as Goldenmars Technology Holdings Limited and changed its name to Huabang Financial Holdings Limited in April 2017. The company was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Kowloon Bay, Hong Kong. Huabang Financial Holdings Limited is a subsidiary of Forever Star Capital Limited.

3652.TWO.summary: Unitech Electronics Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells automatic identification and data capture technologies worldwide. It provides mobile computer products, such as rugged smartphones, touch computers, industrial PDAs, handheld terminals, enterprise tablets, healthcare mobile computers, wearable computers, touch computers, and mobile clinical assistant; barcode scanners that include linear imager, 2D imager, laser, wireless, pocket, ESD safe, healthcare, and wearable scanners, as well as pen and slot readers; and RFID products, such as reader modules, mobile readers, handheld readers, fixed readers, portable/pocket readers, and antennas. The company also offers intelligent integrated terminals that include IP based biometric terminal; and software solutions, such as MoboLink, a device and data exchange management software, as well as StageGO solutions, a barcode-based device staging solution. It serves its customers in the fields of retail, field services, governments, healthcare, hospitality, logistics and transportation, warehousing, and manufacturing. The company was founded in 1979 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan. Unitech Electronics Co., Ltd. operates as a subsidiary of Unitech Computer Co., Ltd.

3659.TWO.summary: Bison Electronics Inc. engages in the manufacture and sale of camera modules and computer peripheral related products in Taiwan. Its products are used in imaging products, such as video camera modules for notebook computers, industrial handheld display products, home care, automotive image related products, etc. The company was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

3665.TW.summary: Bizlink Holding Inc. researches, designs, develops, manufactures, and sells various technological products and components for various technology industries in the United States, China, Germany and internationally. It operates through Computer Related Products, Fiber Optics, Home Appliances, and Others segments. The company provides adapters, high-speed cables, power whips and cables, connectors, modules, hubs and docks, and dongles; and cable storage, integration of electrical and mechanical parts, and over molding of fixings and mountings for cable harnesses, textile braided cable for harness systems, complex wire harnesses, and systems and customized solutions, as well as power cords, wire harness, and wires and cables. It also offers towline, micro coaxial, photoelectric hybrid, drag chain, phase, defibrillation, and USB extender cables, as well as optical fiber patchcord, thermistor detector, and medical raw wire for medical equipment; and transceivers, ultra-compact and high isolation WDM, coupler/PLC, optical switch/VOA, circulator/isolator/hybrid, high density module, and HDMI/DP/USB optical cables for optical fiber communications. In addition, the company provides cables for automation and semiconductor equipment, and subway projects, as well as wire harnesses for oil and gas equipment, and passenger aviation; and solar energy connectivity solutions, including junction boxes, DC branch cables, connectors, and PV cables. Further, it provides battery management system and TVSH harnesses, charging systems and accessories, main harnesses, and automotive wires. Additionally, it engages in the wholesale and retail of cable assemblies, power cords, and connectors, as well as computer peripheral products, electronic materials, fiber optical passive components, and fiber optical cables; and produces and sells fiberfill moldings, smart instrumentational sensors, connectors, and functional materials. The company was founded in 1996 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

3706.TW.summary: MiTAC Holdings Corporation, through its subsidiaries, designs, manufactures, and sells computers and ancillary equipment, and communication related products. The company offers computer frames, motherboards, interface cards, displays, power supplies, keyboards, and related metal stamping and plastic parts, as well as provides maintenance services for motherboards. It is also involved in the research, development, and manufacture of computer software, and provision of related technical advisory services; and research and development of calculators, servers, mobile phones, and PDA and GPS products, as well as provision of technical transfer and advisory services. In addition, the company sells electronic telecommunication products, and communication and software products, as well as offers related after-sale services; and assembles and sells computer peripherals, hardware/software, and related products. Further, it engages in the testing, maintenance, and display of computers, computer components, communication products, and consumer electronic products, as well as provision of related technical advisory and after-sale services; and general investment activities. Additionally, the company offers freight transport agency, export and import trading, and warehousing services; customer data processing, analysis, and integrated services; and business administration services. It operates in Taiwan, the United States, Europe, and internationally. MiTAC Holdings Corporation was founded in 1982 and is headquartered in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.

4832.T.summary: JFE Systems, Inc. provides information systems integration, operation, and maintenance services in Japan. The company provides business systems integration services, including planning and consulting for information systems; design, development, and implementation of building information systems; operating, maintaining, and providing outsourcing services; and enhancing information systems. It also offers product-based solutions, such as building ERP/SCM/production planning systems, BI systems, cost management systems, procurement systems, electronic documentation systems, and quality information management and recipe management systems for the food industry, as well as various packaged software solutions. In addition, the company provides infrastructure/cloud computing solutions, which includes SaaS, PaaS, and IaaS; and system coordination and migration solutions. It serves finance, food products, logistics, automotive, and other manufacturing industries. JFE Systems, Inc. was formerly known as Kawasaki Steel Systems R&D Corporation and changed its name to JFE Systems, Inc. in 2004. The company was founded in 1983 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan. JFE Systems, Inc. is a subsidiary of JFE Steel Corporation.

4915.TW.summary: Primax Electronics Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells mobile device components, computer peripherals, business equipment, and digital home products in Taiwan and internationally. The company offers mobile device components, such as camera and fingerprint modules, solutions for wireless charging, ultra-thin keyboard modules, and mobile camera systems; Bluetooth communications devices, such as Bluetooth headphones, audio transmitters, hands-free car headsets, identification card headphones, image viewers, digital pens, GPS receivers, etc.; and mobile device accessories comprising charging cradles, data cables, car chargers, hands-free car accessories, etc. It also provides PC peripherals, including computer input devices, gaming peripherals, ultra-thin Bluetooth tablet keyboards, and digital writing tablets/stylus; and business equipment consisting of scanners, printers/multifunction printers, shredders, and laminators. In addition, the company offers digital home products, such as smart TV remote controls, wireless portable storage devices, and Internet music boxes; audio products; and product development services comprising usability test and industrial design. Primax Electronics Ltd. was founded in 1984 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

4916.TW.summary: Parpro Corporation provides design and manufacturing services for processor based embedded solutions to original equipment manufacturers in Europe and the United States. It offers switching platforms, multi-core processor cards and blades; embedded hardware system design services; schematic capture and PCB layout design services for hardware development solutions; mechanical design services; and firmware design services. The company also provides wire harness and cable assembly; sheet metal fabrication and finishing; precision machining; subsystem assembly and integration; and box build, kiosk, and rack services. It serves customers in the aerospace, gaming, telecommunication, and industrial markets. The company was formerly known as Pilot Electronics Corporation. Parpro Corporation was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Taoyuan, Taiwan.

4924.TWO.summary: HTM International Holding Ltd. engages in the production and sale of precision molds, computer notebook accessories, hi-fi systems accessories, office automation products, and home audio products and related parts. It offers PC components, including gas injection products; PC peripherals, such as portable hard disk covers and CD boxes; and speakers. The company also provides biomass energy products. It operates in Taiwan, Europe, the United States, Japan, and China. HTM International Holding Ltd. was founded in 1989 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan.

4938.TW.summary: Pegatron Corporation, together with its subsidiaries, engages in designing, manufacturing, and selling computer, communication, and consumer electronic products worldwide. It offers computing products, such as notebooks, desktops, PCs, motherboards, rugged computers, and servers; consumer electronics, including tablets and game consoles, wearable devices, smart home devices, and automotive electronics; and communication products, which include cable modems, set-top boxes, smartphones, switches, and routers. The company also provides car electronics, such as car entertainment products, vehicle telematics, and advanced driver assistance systems; and smart electronics, including Internet of Things products, drones, robots, and virtual reality products. In addition, it offers computer peripherals, digital cameras, plastic and electronic components, precision equipment, LED and relevant lighting products, circuit boards and relevant products, spare parts for notebook computers, computers and application systems, office machinery, hardware, GPS, computer electronic devices, disk drives, calculators, power supply units, computer cases, digital automatic data processors, data storage and processing equipment, wires, cables, computer digital signal process systems and cards, computer data projectors, projection screens, and other related components. Further, the company provides management consulting services; trading electronic parts; and tooling molds for stainless steel computer cases, as well as installs and repairs electronic products. Additionally, it engages in office building leasing activities; investing activities; manufacturing and selling medical appliances; selling iron and aluminum products; travel agency activities; and the provision of logistics, surface processing, and after-sales services. Pegatron Corporation was founded in 2007 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

4987.TWO.summary: Godex International Co., Ltd, an engineering company, designs, manufactures, and sells barcode printing products worldwide. The company offers desktop, industrial, and mobile printers; scanners; label stands; and wax, wax/resin, resin, and near edge ribbons. It also provides label design and printing software under the GoRibbon, GoLabel, GoLabel PDF, and QLabel, GoAPP, and GoUtility names. The company's products are used in healthcare, retail, logistics and transportation, manufacturing, government, travel and leisure, and special material applications. It distributes its products through a network of value add resellers. The company was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

5271.TWO.summary: Horng Tong Enterprise Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, design, manufacture, and sale of electronic connectors in Taiwan. The company offers connectors for mother boards, notebooks, and networks/antennas/RJs; AMOLED materials, sublimation machines, and cameras; and car electronics, including DVRs and AVMs, car chargers, wireless chargers, AVN and ADAS products, dash cam-mirrors, head-up displays, portable car chargers, ATL system products, and 8 in 1 control boxes. It also provides Internet of Things products, such as police devices and equipment, modems, wireless modules, emergency phones, smart crutches, and LTE Mifi products; and communication products. The company was founded in 1998 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

5289.TWO.summary: Innodisk Corporation provides industrial embedded flash and DRAM storage products and technologies in Taiwan. The company offers flash storage products, such as solid state drives (SSDs); SATA Slim for hand-held devices, thin clients, and industrial applications; ServerDOM for server use; CFast, a small form factor for industrial and embedded applications; and mSATA, a compliant module for space-constricted applications. Its flash storage products also include Mini PCIeDOM for server boot applications; M.2 for ultra-thin or compact systems; SATADOM compact form factor suitable for 1U server applications; nanoSSDs; compact flash cards; embedded disk cards; SD and MicroSD cards; USB and EDC; and server boot cards. The company also provides embedded DRAM modules; server memory modules; wide temperature DRAM modules; and special customized DRAM modules. In addition, it offers embedded peripherals comprising AI accelerator cards, storage expansion cards, disk arrays, display cards, and communication modules, as well as flash storage products with various interfaces and form factors. The company's products are used in the aerospace and defense embedded systems, server applications, casino gaming, and in-vehicles, as well as automation, surveillance, networking, healthcare, and retail markets. Innodisk Corporation was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

5386.TWO.summary: Albatron Technology Co., Ltd provides IT solutions and technology equipment for industrial and application PCs in Taiwan. It offers motherboards, graphic cards, minicomputers, and laptops; micron products, including SSD, SSD M.2, RDIMM, UDIMM, SODIMM products; and peripherals and PC components. The company also provides embedded platform products, including embedded systems, ARM boards, and android panel kits; industrial MB products, such as mini-ITX, nano-ITX, and micro ATX products, as well as industrial barebones; gaming peripherals, including headsets; and WPS Office, an office software. In addition, it offers design-in, FAE technical support, manufacturing, and repairing services. The company was founded in 1984 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

5LF.F.summary: MultiQ International AB (publ) provides digital signage and customized monitors primarily for public environment applications in Northern Europe. The company offers monitors, self-service monitors, ITS solutions, outdoor monitors, and monitor accessories for in-store Web and TV; video wall; educational guide; self-service, queue, window, and outdoor signage; point-of-sale; corporate TV; digital menu boards; live betting data; infotainment; real time traffic info; and traffic management info applications. It serves banking, retail, transportation, government, gaming, and corporate markets. The company was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Lund, Sweden.

5MU.F.summary: One Stop Systems, Inc. designs, manufactures, and markets high-performance computing modules and systems for edge deployments in the United States and internationally. Its systems are built using the graphical processing unit (GPU) and solid-state flash technologies. The company provides GPU appliances that are fully integrated computer clusters; GPU expansion units, which could add hundreds or thousands of computing cores with hundreds of teraflops of computing performance to OEM servers virtually; flash storage and network appliances that are networked storage appliances optimized for the environment and system software of its customers; and flash storage arrays, which provide hundreds of terabytes of storage and millions of input/output operations per second with flash memory. It also offers servers for PCI express-over-cable expansion; desktop computing appliances in various configurations that add input/output flexibility to user's desktop systems; PCIe expansions; industrial and panel PCs; and ruggedized mobile high-performance compute devices that meet the specialized requirement for devices deployed at the edge in various environmental conditions. The company sells its products to multinational companies, governmental agencies, and technology providers through its website, web store, direct sales team, and OEM focused sales, as well as through a network of resellers and distributors. One Stop Systems, Inc. was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Escondido, California.

5RZ.F.summary: Razer Inc., an investment holding company, researches, designs, develops, manufactures, distributes, and sells gaming peripherals, systems, software, services, mobiles, and accessories under the Razer brand in the Americas, Europe, the Middle East, Africa, China, rest of the Asia Pacific. The company operates through four segments: Peripherals, Systems, Software and Services, and Others. It offers peripherals, such as gaming mice, headset, desktop, case, monitor, keyboard, controller, audio device, and mouse mat products, as well as apparel, bags, gear, gaming chair, smart glass, console platform, mobile device, mask, headphone amplifier, microphone, and camera products. The company also provides hardware products, including high-performance gaming peripherals; and Razer Blade gaming laptops. In addition, its software platform includes Razer Synapse, an Internet of Things platform; Razer Chroma RGB, a proprietary RGB lighting technology system; and Razer Cortex, a game optimizer and launcher. Further, the company offers Razer Gold, a game/digital entertainment payment service; and Razer Fintech, an offline-to-online digital payment networks in Southeast Asia. Additionally, it provides airtime electronic pins for prepaid services, reload prepaid credit services, and bill payment services; and electronic pins for online games and other related products; as well as establishes, maintains, and operates payment, clearing and settlement system, and other related activities. The company sells its products through a network of distributors and retailers. Razer Inc. was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Irvine, California.

5RZ.SG.summary: Razer Inc., an investment holding company, researches, designs, develops, manufactures, distributes, and sells gaming peripherals, systems, software, services, mobiles, and accessories under the Razer brand in the Americas, Europe, the Middle East, Africa, China, rest of the Asia Pacific. The company operates through four segments: Peripherals, Systems, Software and Services, and Others. It offers peripherals, such as gaming mice, headset, desktop, case, monitor, keyboard, controller, audio device, and mouse mat products, as well as apparel, bags, gear, gaming chair, smart glass, console platform, mobile device, mask, headphone amplifier, microphone, and camera products. The company also provides hardware products, including high-performance gaming peripherals; and Razer Blade gaming laptops. In addition, its software platform includes Razer Synapse, an Internet of Things platform; Razer Chroma RGB, a proprietary RGB lighting technology system; and Razer Cortex, a game optimizer and launcher. Further, the company offers Razer Gold, a game/digital entertainment payment service; and Razer Fintech, an offline-to-online digital payment networks in Southeast Asia. Additionally, it provides airtime electronic pins for prepaid services, reload prepaid credit services, and bill payment services; and electronic pins for online games and other related products; as well as establishes, maintains, and operates payment, clearing and settlement system, and other related activities. The company sells its products through a network of distributors and retailers. Razer Inc. was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Irvine, California.

5RZ0.F.summary: Razer Inc., an investment holding company, researches, designs, develops, manufactures, distributes, and sells gaming peripherals, systems, software, services, mobiles, and accessories under the Razer brand in the Americas, Europe, the Middle East, Africa, China, rest of the Asia Pacific. The company operates through four segments: Peripherals, Systems, Software and Services, and Others. It offers peripherals, such as gaming mice, headset, desktop, case, monitor, keyboard, controller, audio device, and mouse mat products, as well as apparel, bags, gear, gaming chair, smart glass, console platform, mobile device, mask, headphone amplifier, microphone, and camera products. The company also provides hardware products, including high-performance gaming peripherals; and Razer Blade gaming laptops. In addition, its software platform includes Razer Synapse, an Internet of Things platform; Razer Chroma RGB, a proprietary RGB lighting technology system; and Razer Cortex, a game optimizer and launcher. Further, the company offers Razer Gold, a game/digital entertainment payment service; and Razer Fintech, an offline-to-online digital payment networks in Southeast Asia. Additionally, it provides airtime electronic pins for prepaid services, reload prepaid credit services, and bill payment services; and electronic pins for online games and other related products; as well as establishes, maintains, and operates payment, clearing and settlement system, and other related activities. The company sells its products through a network of distributors and retailers. Razer Inc. was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Irvine, California.

600100.SS.summary: Tsinghua Tongfang Co., Ltd. operates as an information and security company. It offers electronic information products, smart city, Internet services, public safety, industrial equipment, illumination, energy conservation and environmental protection, lighting, medical treatment and health, and financial and insurance services and solutions, as well as production, research, and development services. Tsinghua Tongfang Co., Ltd. was founded in 1997 and is based in Beijing, China.

600122.SS.long_name: Jiangsu Hongtu High Technology Co., Ltd.
600122.SS.summary: Jiangsu Hongtu High Technology Co., Ltd. primarily engages in retail, electronics manufacturing, Internet finance, and real estate development activities in the People's Republic of China. The company retails computers, telecommunications, smart living, digital products, DIY computer assembly and IT accessories, various products and accessories, various external devices, network and server equipment, office automation and supplies and other accessory products, software products and IT books, service products, etc. It also offers various services and support, including on-site maintenance, system installation and commissioning, application guidance, technical maintenance, after-sale services, etc. In addition, the company researches, develops, produces, and sells various optical communication products, such as fiber optic and power cables, communication cables, power carrier equipment, optical fiber access equipment, distribution automation and smart instrumentation systems, video surveillance systems, communication power supply systems, and program-controlled switching equipment, as well as manufactures communications equipment, optical cable, consumer electronics, computers, and printers. Further, it develops and operates residential and commercial office buildings. Additionally, the company engages in the processing of copper. Jiangsu Hongtu High Technology Co., Ltd. is based in Nanjing, the People's Republic of China.

600734.SS.summary: Fujian Start Group Co.Ltd provides anti-intrusion detection system services and solutions in China. The company also offers integrated management platform that integrates daily business systems and security systems, such as video analytics, access control system, family telephone and interview system, digital broadcasting system, intercom system, emergency alarm system, and large-screen control systems; image enhancement solutions; intelligent data services; and wisdom judiciary systems. In addition, it provides financial POS machines, mobile payment terminals, and mobile intelligent hardware products. The company was formerly known as Fujian Start Computer Group Co.,Ltd. and changed its name to Fujian Start Group Co.Ltd in July 2009. Fujian Start Group Co.Ltd was founded in 1988 and is based in Fuzhou, China.

603019.SS.summary: Dawning Information Industry Co., Ltd. provides high-performance computing, server, storage, cloud computing, and big data products in China and internationally. It offers rack, storage, and blade servers, as well as high-density servers; workstation products; disk array and cloud storage products; server cabinets and cooling solutions; high-performance computers; and cloud computing products. The company was founded in 1996 and is based in Beijing, China. Dawning Information Industry Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Landsea Green Group Co., Ltd.

603933.SS.summary: Fujian Raynen Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the distribution of IC products in China. The company also researches, develops, produces, and sells computer control systems for knitting machines and textile servo drivers. Its products include flat knitting machine computer control systems, vamp flat knitting machine computer control systems, operation boxes, main controllers, take-down comb controllers, carriage controllers, and integrated power supply products; and single-axis and digital dual-axis servo drivers. In addition, the company is involved in various activities, including application software development for knitting industry, industrial electrical automation products distribution, system integration, etc. Fujian Raynen Technology Co., Ltd. was formerly known as Fujian Raynen Electronics Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Fujian Raynen Technology Co., Ltd. in 2013. The company was founded in 2007 and is headquartered in Fuzhou, China.

6116.TW.summary: HannStar Display Corporation researches, develops, designs, manufactures, sells, and repairs thin film transistor (TFT)-liquid crystal display (LCD) products and touch panels under the HannsG and Hannspree brands. The company also offers flat-panel displays, and CCTV and related components. Its TFT-LCD products are used in notebook computer displays, desktop computer monitors, tablets, portable DVDs, digital photo frames, PND/car displays, mobiles, and wearable products. The company operates in Mainland China, Europe, Taiwan, and internationally. HannStar Display Corporation was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

6161.TWO.summary: Jetway Information Co., Ltd. designs, manufactures, and sells motherboards and other IT products worldwide. It also provides AIO products, graphic cards, IPC boards, barebones, and chassis products. The company was founded in 1986 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

6166.TW.summary: ADLINK Technology, Inc. manufactures and sells hardware, software, and peripheral devices for industrial computers in Asia Pacific, Mainland China, America, and Europe. The company offers processor blades, switch blades, and platforms; AI training platforms; CompactPCI blades, switches, backplanes, enclosures and systems, peripherals and accessories, rear transition modules, power supplies, and intelligent railway platforms; computer-on-modules; multi-function DAQ, USB DAQ, digital I/O, digitizer, dynamic signal analyzer, GPIB, timer/counter, and test and measurement software and utility products; deep learning accelerators, edge AI platforms and servers, and AI machine vision devices; and embedded flash storage solutions. It also provides embedded graphics, EtherCAT solutions, extreme outdoor servers, industrial fieldbuses, industrial motherboards and SBCs, industrial PCs, fanless embedded PCs, and infotainment internet of things (IoT) devices; and medical panel computers and tablets, network security appliances, panel PCs and monitors, single board computers, and PXI/PXIe platforms, as well as motion control and machine vision products. In addition, the company offers railway systems, ROS2 solutions, rugged VITA 75 COTS computers, and video processing servers, as well as VPX and smart manufacturing solutions. Further, it provides graphics processing unit, IoT, and artificial intelligence and robotics solutions. The company serves intelligent systems, defense and aviation, industrial automation, infotainment, power/energy, healthcare, test and measurement, transportation, telecommunication, network security, smart manufacturing, retail, cities and environmental, and buildings industries. ADLINK Technology, Inc. was incorporated in 1995 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

6172.TW.summary: Billionton Systems Inc. manufactures and sells wireless and communication products. It offers smart film/PET products; RFID products; USB hub and network cards; memory cards; wireless LAN and Ethernet products; USB hub Ethernet adapters, cables, and rechargers; and multimedia products, such as Bluetooth headphones, speakers, and modules. The company was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Hsinchu City, Taiwan.

6188.TWO.summary: Quanta Storage Inc. designs, develops, manufactures, and sells optical storage products to computer manufacturers worldwide. The company offers storage and peripheral products, such as NAS, DAS, USB-C power delivery and mini docks, adapters, and Wi-Fi storage products. It also provides solid state drives and intelligent automation systems; and storage manufacturing services of storage devices and systems, computer peripherals, and IoT related products. In addition, the company offers project planning, product development, technical, design, engineering mechanism, electrical engineering, logistics management, and repair and maintenance services. Quanta Storage Inc. was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Taoyuan, Taiwan.

6197.TW.summary: Jess-link Products Co., Ltd. provides various electronic products in Taiwan and internationally. It offers connectors, such as EMI cages, high-speed connectors, I/O connectors, and magnetic and modular jacks and plugs; Cable Assemblies, including direct attach cables, high speed cable assemblies, fiber optic assemblies, FFC jumpers, ethernet LAN cables, I/O cable assemblies, LVDS, and industrial cables; active optical cables; and flexible flat, bulk flat, high speed, high temperature, and high power flat cables. The company also provides robot and controller solutions, machine vision and surveillance solutions, PLC solutions, and IPC solutions; IoT products consisting of IoT modules, homekit products, smart home products, and NBIoT devices; wireless chargers; remote controllers; and programmable IoT buttons, IoT scanners, streaming music players, wireless power, and MFi series products. In addition, it offers accessories, such as lightning hubs/dongles, type-c hubs/ dongles, convertors/adpators, fast chargers, and car chargers; automotive products, energy storage systems, and green energy products; and customized cable assembly services. The company's products are used in smart connection, datacenter/networking/telecom, Internet of Things (IoT), and new energy and vehicle industries. Jess-link Products Co., Ltd. was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

6199.TWO.summary: TienPin United Enterprise CO., LTD. operates as a flash storage manufacturer in Taiwan. The company designs, manufactures, and sells portable storage products. It offers flash card readers/writers and adapters, digital photo frames, digital signage products, LCD TV player modules, fingerprint devices, and flash drives. The company was formerly known as DataFab Systems Inc. and changed its name to TienPin United Enterprise CO., LTD. in July 2015. TienPin United Enterprise CO., LTD. is headquartered in Pingzhen, Taiwan.

6206.TW.summary: Flytech Technology Co., Ltd. designs, manufactures, and sells computers and peripherals in Taiwan, Europe, Africa, the Americas, and Asia. It offers all-in-one point-of-sales (POS), panel PC, mobile POS, KIOSK, box PC, and POS monitors. The company also engages in the operating software design and data processing services; and integration of software and hardware services. In addition, it offers customized hardware design and manufacturing services, including product conceptualization, circuit board and mechanical design, BIOS and firmware, validation test, material procurement, manufacturing, shipment, and after sales services for computer based niche products. It serves hospitality, retail, medical, industrial, commercial, and payment industries. The company was founded in 1984 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

6232.T.summary: Autonomous Control Systems Laboratory Ltd. develops, produces, sells, and services industrial drones in Japan and internationally. It offers autonomous machines, including fully automated drones for various applications, such as delivery, inspection, disaster relief, and emerging use-cases. The company was founded in 1998 and is based in Tokyo, Japan.

6245.TWO.summary: Lanner Electronics Inc. provides design, engineering, and manufacturing services for advanced network appliances and rugged applied computing platforms for system integrators, service providers, and application developers worldwide. The company offers network appliances, such as modules and acceleration cards, white box hardware solutions, wide temperature network appliances, desktop network appliances, and rackmount network appliances; and telecom datacenter appliances consisting of cloud storage, HybridTCA, vCPE/uCPE, and video transport platforms, as well as modules and blades, and hyper-converged appliances. It also provides intelligent edge appliances, including DIN-Rail industrial gateway, edge AI appliance, embedded platform, intelligent video platform, rackmount industrial computer, rugged wireless gateway, vehicle gateway, and vehicle/rail computer; and extension modules comprising LTE radio modules. The company offers its products for use in various applications, such as network computing, telecommunication, transportation, power and energy, industrial automation, intelligent systems, software-defined wide area network, and edge AI applications. Lanner Electronics Inc. was founded in 1986 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

6277.TW.summary: Aten International Co., Ltd engages in the development, manufacture, and sale of IT infrastructure access management solution, professional audio/video, green energy, and related products. The company's products comprise KVM products, including cable, desktop, cat 5, rack, secure, matrix, and LCD KVM switches; and KVM extenders, KVM modules and accessories, KVM over IP switches, computer sharing devices, management software/control centers, serial console servers, accessories, and remote control and monitoring solutions. It also offers professional audio/video products, such as control systems, presentation switches, networked AVs, video matrix switches, video switches and splitters, video extenders, converters, accessories, and software products, as well as energy intelligence power distribution unit (PDU)/UPS/rack products comprising metered-ready, metered, switched, outlet-metered, outlet-metered-switched, and basic PDU products; PDU accessories; professional online UPS; standing network rack; and energy and DCIM management software products. In addition, the company provides USB and thunderbolt products, which include content creation products, docking stations and switches, peripheral switches, USB converters and extenders, gamepad emulators, USB/FireWire hubs, and host controller cards; data communication products, such as auto switches and industry controls; and cables, including cat 5, daisy chain, DVI, HDMI, KVM, VGA, cat 6, and display port cables. The company was formerly known as HOZN Automation Co. Ltd. and changed its name to Aten International Co., Ltd in 1988. The company was founded in 1979 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

6413.T.summary: Riso Kagaku Corporation provides products and services in the paper communication field in Japan and internationally. The company offers full color inkjet printers and consumables, digital duplicators and consumables, and digital screen makers and consumables under the ComColor, GOCCOPRO, and RISOGRAPH names, as well as technical training services. It offers its products to educational institutions, government and public agencies, companies, and stores. Riso Kagaku Corporation was founded in 1946 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

6414.TW.summary: Ennoconn Corporation designs and develops industrial mother boards in Taiwan and internationally. It offers hardware system solutions to various vertical market applications, including point-of-sales (POS), banking automation, kiosk, lottery, and industrial automation. The company also provides motherboards, POS products, embedded box PCs, HMIs, and kiosk self-service terminal solutions; and design to order and electronic manufacturing services. In addition, it researches, develops, and sells hardware and software products; manufactures, wholesales, imports/exports, and services industrial computer and industrial systems; researches, develops, produces, and sells electronic materials for hardware and software products; and wholesales electronic materials, as well as provides installation, debugging, and technical consultation services. Further, the company is involved in the intelligent technology development and sale of hardware; wholesale and retail of telecommunications control of radio frequency equipment input and information software; research, design, and sale of mobile payment, electronic signature, and information security systems; sale of network storage equipment and maintenance services; and import and export trading activities. Additionally, it offers electronic parts, computer and peripheral devices, multimedia products, molds, servers, communication machinery and equipment, and spare parts, and after-sales services; and software services. The company was incorporated in 1999 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

6416.T.summary: Katsuragawa Electric Co., Ltd. develops, manufactures, and sells large format color printers, large format printers/multifunction machines, scanners, and related equipment and software. The company also provides micro motors. It sells its products in the United States, Europe, and Asia. Katsuragawa Electric Co., Ltd. was founded in 1945 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

6430.T.summary: Daikoku Denki Co., Ltd. develops, manufactures, and sells computer and other information system equipment for pachinko halls in Japan. The company also develops software; and develops, manufactures, and sells units for pachinko and pachislo game machines. In addition, it provides information on pachinko halls and game machines through PC and cell-phone Web sites, and pay TV channels. The company was incorporated in 1947 and is headquartered in Nagoya, Japan.

6485.TWO.summary: ASolid Technology Co., Ltd. operates as a NAND flash controller provider in Taiwan. It offers SD/microSD controllers, USB flash drive controllers, eMMC controllers, and SSD and UFD controllers. The company was founded in 2008 and is based in Hsinchu, Taiwan.

6570.TWO.summary: Aplex Technology Inc. develops, manufactures, and sells industrial PC products worldwide. The company provides stainless steel panel, industrial panel, embedded box, marine panel, in-vehicle panel, and ATEx panel PC products. It also offers human-machine interfaces, ATEx displays, ATEx box pc products, industrial displays and boards, and machine vision systems, as well as accessories, including storage products, power adapters and modules, converter boards, and product stands. The company provides its products for use in smart factory, surveillance, control and communication, machine vision, food and beverage automation, kiosk and ticketing, ATEX oil and gas, smart warehousing and transportation, and healthcare applications. Aplex Technology Inc. was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

6579.TW.summary: AAEON Technology Inc. designs and manufactures advanced industrial and embedded computing platforms worldwide. The company offers embedded boards, such as embedded single board computers, computer-on-modules, industrial motherboards, smart display modules, and RISC and PICMG single board computers; and computing systems, including panel and fanless embedded box PCs, industrial touch displays, machine vision and digital signage systems, turn-key chassis solutions, multi-PoE and fanless appliances, and industrial chassis. It also provides rugged tablet computers and accessories; UP boards and systems; artificial intelligence (AI) Edge solutions and modules; and network appliances, such as desktop and rackmount network appliances, networking motherboards, and network interface modules. In addition, the company offers IoT gateway boards and systems. Its products are used in smart city, safety and security, smart retail and manufacturing, AI computing platform, network, software defined wide area network, intelligent vending machine, vision system solution, smart office/wellness sensor, and rugged tablet applications. The company was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

6588.T.summary: Toshiba Tec Corporation, together with its subsidiaries, develops, manufactures, sells, and maintains retail and printing solutions in Japan, the Americas, Europe, Asia, and internationally. The company operates through Retail Solutions Business Group and Printing Solutions Business Group segments. It offers point-of-sale (POS) systems, printers, peripherals, self-checkout systems, and kiosks and displays, as well as POS applications, operating systems, middleware, and system management software solutions. The company also provides desktop and mobile printers, industrial printers, and industrial-desktop printers; inkjet head products; and color, monochrome, and hybrid MFP solutions, as well as paper reusing systems, and mobile and cloud solutions. In addition, it offers digital signage solutions; and engineering, manufacturing, and documentation services. The company was founded in 1950 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan. Toshiba Tec Corporation is a subsidiary of Toshiba Corporation.

6597.T.summary: HPC SYSTEMS Inc. develops, manufactures, and sells high-performance and embedded computers in Japan. Its principal products are cluster computers and personal cluster systems. The company is also specializes in science and technology calculations; and provides consulting services. It serves research institutes, including government labs, universities, and multi-national corporate research and development centers. The company was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

6599.T.summary: Ebrains, Inc. designs, develops, and produces industrial electronics and industrial computers designed for information, communications, control, video, and measurement. It offers CompactPCI products; advancedTCA backplane products; backplanes, DIN racks, universal boards, card extenders, unit power supplies, cabinets, and related devices; industrial system chassis with CPU boards and various I/O boards; custom backplanes/custom racks and chassis designed on commission; and custom backplanes/custom racks/custom chassis on commission. The company was founded in 1973 and is headquartered in Hachioji, Japan.

6599.TWO.summary: Poindus Systems Corp. designs and manufactures POS terminal and touch display products worldwide. The company offers panel PCs, tablets, small and large size displays, box PCs, POS peripherals, and custom products. Its products are used in hospitality, retail, medical, and industrial applications. The company was founded in 2009 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

6639.T.summary: Contec Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells industrial computers, and ICT devices and components worldwide. It offers CONPROSYS industrial Internet of Things (IoT) products, including M2M controllers and gateways, PAC systems, IoT edge controllers, I/O modules, remote I/O, telemeters, appliance-alpha series, software, and cloud services; and remote I/O communication coupler, I/O, and digital I/O modules. The company also provides PC-based DAQ and control products comprising USB modules, PCI express cards, PCI cards, wireless and Ethernet I/O modules, and software; and FLEXLAN IoT industrial IoT networks. In addition, it offers embedded and box computers, edge computers, industrial motherboards, panel computers/all-in-ones, flat panel displays, and digital signage players; FA computers VPC and custom PC solutions; industrial grade tablets; and medical grade displays. Further, the company provides FLEXLAN FX - distributed and centralized wireless LAN systems; system integration services; and cloud data services, as well as software development and electronics manufacturing services. It provides solutions to the manufacturing, automotive, social infrastructure, transportation, medical and healthcare, logistics, energy, education, construction and building, and agriculture industries. The company was founded in 1975 and is headquartered in Osaka, Japan. Contec Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Daifuku Co., Ltd.

6669.TW.summary: Wiwynn Corporation researches, designs, develops, tests, and sells computing and storage products, and rack solutions for cloud infrastructures and data centers in Taiwan, the United States, Europe, Asia, and internationally. The company offers integrated solutions to enterprises that want to build, distribute, or resell cloud services to their clients. Its products include servers, storage products, open rack accessories, computer accelerators, OCP network mezzanine cards, storage cards, and system software products. The company also provides computer and peripheral equipment, data storage media products, electric appliances and media products, and information software. In addition, the company offers management consulting services; information software services; and data processing services. It also exports its products. The company was founded in 2012 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

6670.T.summary: MCJ Co., Ltd. engages in the PC related and entertainment businesses in Japan. It manufactures, sells, and retails PCs and monitors; distributes PC components; provides repair and technical support services for IT products; and operates Internet cafes. The company was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

6676.T.summary: Melco Holdings Inc., through its subsidiaries, develops, manufactures, and sells digital home appliances and PC peripherals in Japan and internationally. The company offers various network products, such as Wi-Fi; external hard drives for PC/TV recording; storage products comprising NAS for corporate users; Omoidebako digital photo albums; and digital music library devices. It also provides various services and solutions for personal customers and corporate users that includes apartment Wi-Fi Internet services for rental properties and data recovery services for storage products. In addition, the company offers a range of products that consists of udon, soba, Chinese, fried, and Ryusui noodles, as well as pasta. Further, it provides investment management and financial instrument intermediary services. The company was founded in 1975 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

6680.TWO.summary: Sintrones Technology Corp. designs, develops, manufactures, and sells in-vehicle computing products in Taiwan and internationally. The company provides in-vehicle computing solutions, such as in-vehicle computers, CAN bus modules, GPS modules, in-vehicle displays, and video capture cards; embedded computing products, including fanless box computers and embedded boards; and AI GPU computers, as well as surveillance computers. Its products are used in the autonomous, smart factory, public transit, railway computer, fleet management, law enforcement, in-vehicle computer, outdoor video surveillance, wind energy, and military computer applications. The company is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

6724.T.summary: Seiko Epson Corporation, together with its subsidiaries, develops, manufactures, sells, and provides services for products in the printing solutions, visual communications, wearable and industrial products, and other businesses. It operates through three segments: Printing Solutions, Visual Communications, and Wearable & Industrial Products segments. The Printing Solutions segment offers home and office inkjet printers, serial impact dot matrix printers, page printers, color image scanners, large-format inkjet printers, commercial and industrial inkjet printing systems, printers for use in POS systems, inkjet printheads and related consumables, dry process office papermaking systems, personal computers, and others. The Visual Communications segment provides 3LCD projectors for business, education, the home, and event; smart glasses; and others. The Wearable & Industrial Products segment offers wristwatches, watch movements, factory automation products, industrial robots, IC handlers, crystal units, crystal oscillators, quartz sensors, and others for consumer, automotive, and industrial equipment applications; and sensing equipment. This segment also provides CMOS LSIs and other chips primarily for consumer electronics and automotive applications; and metal powders for use as raw materials in the production of electronic components, etc., as well as value-added surface finishing in a range of industrial fields. It has operations in Japan, the Philippines, Indonesia, China, and internationally. The company was founded in 1942 and is headquartered in Suwa, Japan.

6727.T.summary: Wacom Co., Ltd. develops, manufactures, and sells electronic devices and related software worldwide. It operates through Branded Business and Technology Solution Business segments. It provides input components and sensor systems to manufacturers of smartphones, tablets, and notebook PCs. The company also offers pen computers, such as MobileStudio Pro; pen displays, including Wacom One, Cintiq 13HD, Cintiq 22HD, Cintiq 22HD touch, Cintiq 27QHD, Cintiq 27QHD touch, Wacom Cintiq, and Wacom Cintiq Pro; pen tablets comprising Wacom Intuos, Wacom Intuos Pro, and Wacom Intuos Pro Paper; and smart pads consisting of Bamboo Slate and Bamboo Folio. In addition, it provides Bamboo Ink, Bamboo Ink Plus, Bamboo Sketch, Bamboo Solo, Bamboo Duo, Bamboo Fineline, and Bamboo Alpha styluses; and apps and services, such as Bamboo Paper, Inkspace, and Wacom Notes. Wacom Co., Ltd. was founded in 1983 and is headquartered in Kazo, Japan.

6731.T.summary: Pixela Corporation develops image processing technologies in the fields of software and hardware in Japan. The company develops digital televisions and set-top boxes that support ISDB system under the PRODIA brand name; receiver modules and middleware for OEM business; digital televisions for PCs; application software to receive digital broadcasting with Android smartphones; and image processing application software for PC use. Its mobile applications include SeeQVault, a player that allows user to play HD quality TV programs; and plane analyzer, a golf swing and analyzing software. The company's authoring products comprise 3D to LR Converter EX, which converts 3D video files recorded with a camcorder into two video files, including video for right-eye and video for left-eye; and PixeBurn! for HD, a software that enables to write videos recorded in AVCHD standard onto DVD or BD discs. Pixela Corporation was founded in 1982 and is headquartered in Osaka, Japan.

6734.T.summary: Newtech Co.,Ltd. provides storage products and solutions. It offers servers, desktop and rack mount NAS products, and Mac compatible products. The company also provides GPU, USB/thunderbolt storage products, FC / iSCSI RAID, network switch and card products, backup and log management software products, built-in RAID board, UPS, rack cabinet. Newtech Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1982 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

6737.T.summary: EIZO Corporation designs, develops, manufactures, and sells visual display systems, amusement monitors, and related services in Japan, Europe, North America, and internationally. It provides LCD, color management, and home entertainment monitors; operating room solutions; and medical monitors. The company also offers industrial monitors; and ATC visual display solutions, such as primary control monitors, tower monitors, encoding and streaming solutions, data capture and content management solutions, and graphics boards. In addition, it provides business enterprise, healthcare, creative work, security and surveillance, touch panel, maritime, air traffic control, home entertainment, and rugged solutions. The company was formerly known as Eizo Nanao Corporation and changed its name to EIZO Corporation in 2013. EIZO Corporation was founded in 1968 and is headquartered in Hakusan, Japan.

6750.T.summary: Elecom Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells personal computer and digital device related products worldwide. The company offers peripherals, I/O devices, and PC accessories, such as mouse pads, mice, and keyboards; tablet PCs and smartphones, as well as health care products, including body composition scales and electric therapy equipment; digital field products; network products, such as wireless LAN routers; audio visual device-related products; wearable products; and application development products, as well as cloud and installation services for wireless LAN access points. The company was incorporated in 1986 and is headquartered in Osaka, Japan.

6789.T.summary: Roland DG Corporation manufactures and sells computer peripheral equipment in Japan, Asia, the United States, Europe, and internationally. The company offers wide-format color inkjet printers, inkjet printer/cutters, vinyl cutting machines, 3D milling machines, 3D printers, engraving machines, dental milling machines, dental 3D printers, and photo impact printers. It sells its products under the TrueVIS, monoFab, and DGSHAPE brand names. The company was formerly known as AMDEK Corporation and changed its name to Roland DG Corporation in 1983. Roland DG Corporation was founded in 1981 and is headquartered in Hamamatsu, Japan.

6803.T.summary: Teac Corporation engages in the audio and information product businesses in Japan and internationally. Its audio products comprise high-end and general audio products; audio equipment for music production and broadcasting; and contract/professional audio products. The company's information products include recording and reproducing equipment for aircraft, medical image recording and reproducing products, and optical drives for industrial market, as well as measurement products, such as sensors/transducers, and data recorders; and in-flight entertainment, data storage, and disc publishing products. It also provides commissioned design and contract manufacturing solutions; business solutions; and repair and maintenance services. The company was incorporated in 1948 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan. Teac Corporation is a subsidiary of Global Acoustic Partners LLC.

6805.TWO.summary: Fositek Corp. designs, manufactures, and distributes consumer electronic components. The company produces connecting rotating shafts, cantilever brackets, and other components for computers, optics, appliances, and communications and medical equipment. It markets its products in Asia, the United States, and internationally. The company was founded in 1990 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

6825.TWO.summary: Qbic Technology Co., Ltd. develops and sells commercial and industrial grade devices in Taiwan. The company provides smart panel-PCs, embedded and fanless ARM box-PCs, fanless AI edge computers, embedded and fanless x86 box-PCs, single board computers, OQupancy manager devices, kiosks, and accessories It offers devices for facility management, embedded computing, retail and hospitality solution, interactive smart technology, and design and manufacturing. The company is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

6840.T.summary: AKIBA Holdings Co.,Ltd. manufactures and sells products related to electronic components and computers. It manufactures and distributes add-on memory products for personal computers and servers, SD cards and MicroSD cards, USB flash memory, SSD, CF cards, CFast cards, etc.; and IoT systems, peripheral devices, and microcomputer devices. The company also offers engineering services for telecommunication networks and corporate infrastructure, packaged support services for BPO, and telecommunication consulting services; and engages in the temporary employment and recruiting agency, and system development and contracting businesses. In addition, it provides multi-share contact center services; and computers for scientific technological calculation, targeting research and development divisions of universities, research institutes, and corporate sectors that need scientific technological calculators. The company was formerly known as ADTEC Corporation and changed its name to AKIBA Holdings Co.,Ltd. in October 2015. AKIBA Holdings Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1983 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

6862.T.summary: MINATO HOLDINGS INC. engages in the memory module-related, device programming and display solutions, system development-related, and other businesses. It manufactures and sells computer storage devices, such as dual inline memory modules for industrial equipment applications; and device programmer, touch panel, and digital signage products. The company also engages in the development of information systems and dispatches engineers; intelligent stereo camera and LED lighting business; solar power generation; provision of consulting services for website construction; and advertising production, sales promotion, and marketing. The company was formerly known as Minato Electronics Inc. and changed its name to MINATO HOLDINGS INC. in July 2015. MINATO HOLDINGS INC. was founded in 1951 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

688086.SS.summary: Amethystum Storage Technology Co., Ltd engages in the research and development, design, production, sale, and service of optical storage media and equipment, and intelligent data hierarchical storage and information technology solutions in China. The company offers data storage and security products, as well as AmeCloud, a enterprise cloud storage solution. Its products and services are applied in government administration, health care, and archives industries to facilitate the national strategies for the big data development and information security. The company was founded in 2010 and is headquartered in Meizhou, China.

6939.HK.summary: MEGAIN Holding (Cayman) Co., Ltd. engages in the research, design, development, and sale of compatible cartridge chips. The company was incorporated in 2016 and is based in Zhuhai, the People's Republic of China.

6C2.F.summary: Corsair Gaming, Inc., together with its subsidiaries, designs, markets, and distributes gaming and streaming peripherals, components and systems in the Americas, Europe, the Middle East, and the Asia Pacific. The company offers gamer and creator peripherals, including gaming keyboards, mice, headsets, and controllers, as well as capture cards, stream decks, USB microphones, studio accessories, and EpocCam software. It also provides gaming components and systems comprising power supply units, cooling solutions, computer cases, and DRAM modules, as well as prebuilt and custom-built gaming PCs, and others; and PC gaming software comprising iCUE for gamers and Elgato's streaming suite for content creators. In addition, the company offers coaching and training, and other services. It sells its products through a network of distributors and retailers, including online retailers, as well as directly to consumers through its websites. Corsair Gaming, Inc. was incorporated in 1994 and is headquartered in Fremont, California. Corsair Gaming, Inc. operates as a subsidiary of Corsair Group (Cayman), LP.

6C2.MU.summary: Corsair Gaming, Inc., together with its subsidiaries, designs, markets, and distributes gaming and streaming peripherals, components and systems in the Americas, Europe, the Middle East, and the Asia Pacific. The company offers gamer and creator peripherals, including gaming keyboards, mice, headsets, and controllers, as well as capture cards, stream decks, USB microphones, studio accessories, and EpocCam software. It also provides gaming components and systems comprising power supply units, cooling solutions, computer cases, and DRAM modules, as well as prebuilt and custom-built gaming PCs, and others; and PC gaming software comprising iCUE for gamers and Elgato's streaming suite for content creators. In addition, the company offers coaching and training, and other services. It sells its products through a network of distributors and retailers, including online retailers, as well as directly to consumers through its websites. Corsair Gaming, Inc. was incorporated in 1994 and is headquartered in Fremont, California. Corsair Gaming, Inc. operates as a subsidiary of Corsair Group (Cayman), LP.

7709.T.summary: KUBOTEK Corporation manufactures and sells computer systems, robots, exterior inspection systems, and line observation/monitoring/management systems in Japan. Its Inspection Systems division offers optics products for the inspection of flat panel displays. The company's Media & Network Systems division supplies systems that integrate the compression of image/video data and network for use in various remote monitoring systems, public video display systems, etc. Its Creation Engineering division provides computer assisted creation systems that integrate the measurement and machining functions with the modeling function. KUBOTEK Corporation was founded in 1979 and is headquartered in Osaka, Japan.

7739.T.summary: Canon Electronics Inc. develops, produces, and sells precision machines and instruments, and electric and electronic machines and instruments in Japan and internationally. The company also provides information devices; and software for computers and communications devices. It offers document, network, check, and flatbed scanners; handy terminals; and bundled software. The company was formerly known as Chichibu Eikosha Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Canon Electronics Inc. in 1964. Canon Electronics Inc. was incorporated in 1947 and is headquartered in Chichibu, Japan.

7751.T.summary: Canon Inc. manufactures and sells office multifunction devices (MFDs), plain paper copying machines, laser and inkjet printers, cameras, diagnostic equipment, and lithography equipment. The company operates through four segments: Office Business Unit, Imaging System Business Unit, Medical System Business Unit, and Industry and Others Business Unit. The Office Business Unit segment offers office MFDs, printers, and copying machines for personal and office use; production print products for print professionals; and laser multifunction and laser printers, digital continuous feed presses, digital sheet-fed presses, wide-format printers, and document solutions, as well as software, services, and solutions. The Imaging System Business Unit segment provides interchangeable-lens digital cameras, digital compact cameras, interchangeable lenses, compact photo printers, inkjet printers, large format inkjet printers, commercial photo printers, image scanners, and calculators. The Medical System Business Unit segment offers digital radiography systems, diagnostic X-ray systems, computed tomography systems, magnetic resonance imaging systems, diagnostic ultrasound systems, clinical chemistry analyzers, and ophthalmic equipment. The Industry and Others Business Unit segment provides semiconductor lithography equipment, flat panel display lithography equipment, vacuum thin-film deposition equipment, organic light-emitting diode panel manufacturing equipment, die bonders, network cameras, digital camcorders, digital cinema cameras, multimedia projectors, broadcast equipment, micromotors, handy terminals, and document scanners. The company also provides maintenance services; and supplies replacement drums, parts, toners, and papers. It sells its products under the Canon brand through subsidiaries or independent distributors to dealers and retail outlets, as well as directly to end-users globally. Canon Inc. was founded in 1933 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

7EB.F.summary: Ebang International Holdings Inc., through its subsidiaries, engages in the research, design, and development of application-specific integrated circuit chips and manufacture of Bitcoin mining machines in China, the United States, Hong Kong, and internationally. It also provides mining machine hosting services that enable customers to operate mining machines remotely, as well as offers routine maintenance services. In addition, the company engages in the research, development, manufacture, and sale of fiber optical telecommunication products, including PDH fiber optical multiplexers, E+E fiber optical multiplexers, 1+1 dual fiber interface back-up fiber optical multiplexers, voice fiber optical multiplexers, date video fiber optical multiplexers, fiber modems, protocol converters, optical fiber transceivers, timeslot multiplexers, PAS repeaters, and others, as well as transmission network and converged communication products. Further, it offers enterprise convergent terminal products, including gigabit passive optical network, enterprise cloud gateway devices, industrial Internet of Things access devices, and business enterprise smart wireless access devices. The company offers Bitcoin mining machines under the Ebit brand. It serves blockchain and telecommunications industries. The company sells its blockchain products directly, as well as through its website; and telecommunication products under the EBANG brand name primarily through supplier contracts. Ebang International Holdings Inc. was incorporated in 2018 and is headquartered in Hangzhou, China.

8032.TWO.summary: Koryo Electronics Co., Ltd. engages in the production, sale, and import/export of electronic parts and components, and computers and computer peripherals. It also imports/exports electric appliances and components, such as TV sets, video and radio cassette recorders, air conditioners, refrigerators, and microwave ovens; and acts as an agent for related products of Taiwan and international companies on sales, bids, and quotes. The company was founded in 1987 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

8050.TWO.summary: IBASE Technology Inc. designs, develops, manufactures, and sells industrial PCs in Taiwan and internationally. The company primarily offers industrial motherboards, embedded systems, panel PCs, digital signage players, and network appliances, as well as RISC computing products, such as ARM-based Freescale i.MX6 SBCs, SMARC modules and carrier boards, and SMARC development kits for various applications in industrial automation, smart retail, networking and communication, intelligent transportation, medical, gaming, healthcare, smart factory, and entertainment and hospitality markets. It also provides original and joint design manufacturing services, such as board/system specification design, software design, manufacturing, validation, and after services. The company was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

8054.TWO.summary: Alcor Micro,Corp., a fabless IC design company, designs, develops, and markets integrated semiconductor chips and software solutions for the personal computer peripherals and consumer electronics worldwide. The company offers human interface input and output solutions, such as flash media reader, USB hub, camera, and other multimedia related controllers. It also provides mobile device, data link, USB flash disk, and SSD storage controllers, as well as SD card controllers. The company was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

8071.TWO.summary: ABICO NetCom Co.,Ltd. operates as a pre-recorded disk manufacturing company. The company engages in the real estate investment business; film production/marketing/acting agent business; and investment businesses. It offers contact lenses; digital business machines, POS systems, and communication systems; sports related supplies; machines and printers; components and production molds; auto parts, modules, power tool machine gear packs, and residential appliances/ OA-related parts; mobile phones, digital cameras, 3C electronics products, metal and plastic chassis exterior parts, and internal components; and digital imaging products. The company was formerly known as ABICO-FS Co., Ltd. and changed its name to ABICO NetCom Co.,Ltd. in 2019. ABICO NetCom Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

8076.TWO.summary: Firich Enterprises Co., Ltd. engages in the design and manufacture of POS systems worldwide. The company offers XPOS and mobile POS products; POS and BOX systems; lite, fanless, and performance panel PCs; monitors; kiosks; and peripherals. It provides POS solutions for the hospitality and retail markets. The company was founded in 1995 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

8087.TWO.summary: Homenema Technology Incorporation manufactures and sells professional pre-recorded optic discs in Taiwan. The company offers compact discs (CDs) consisting of audio and video CDs, as well as mixed mode, ROM, and card CDs; and digital versatile discs. It also provides packaging services. The company's products are used in digital music and videos, gaming, software, and business cards applications. Homenema Technology Incorporation was founded in 1997 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan.

8088.TWO.summary: Panram International Corp. provides electronic manufacturing services in Taiwan. The company offers services, such as ODM and OEM services, as well as product design, raw material procurement, logistic management, transportation, product testing, and RMA services. Its products include DRAM modules; flash memory products, such as pen drives and fingerprint drives; I/O products; keyboards, touch panel control boards, and VGA cards; and embedded storage products, touch screen controllers, and card readers. The company also provides SSDs, SD/microSD cards and USB modules, FDM modules, conformal coatings, and anti-sulfur modules. Panram International Corp. was founded in 1994 and is based in Taipei City, Taiwan.

8093.TWO.summary: Enermax Technology Corporation manufactures and sells PC components and peripherals worldwide. It offers power supplies; cases comprising full, mid, and mini towers; fans; air and liquid coolers; peripherals, such as monitor stands, USB fans, air guides, headset holders, blackplane modules, mobile racks, card readers, HDD enclosures, keyboards, and notebook coolers; and audio products, including speakers and earphones. The company was founded in 1990 and is based in Taoyuan, Taiwan.

8119.TWO.summary: Clientron Corp. provides integrated embedded solutions worldwide. It designs, manufactures, and supplies thin client solutions, POS systems, automotive electronics, and embedded computing solutions, as well as offers after sales services. The company was incorporated in 1983 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

8163.TW.summary: Darfon Electronics Corp. provides eco-friendly technologies for IT peripherals, passive components, and green energy solutions. It offers human interface devices, including laptop keyboards, desktop keyboards, and IT accessories and gaming products; wired headphones and wireless headsets, mice, and keyboards; and point stick, full cap printing, RGB backlight, thin switches, and gaming switches. The company also provides capacitors, inductors, and bead products. In addition, it offers robot cleaners, server storage BBUs, and e-bike and high-voltage automobile batteries; and micro-inverter solar power systems and hybrid solar power systems. Further, the company provides battery pack products, such as vacuum cleaners, robot cleaners, multi-function cleaners, handheld cleaners, and portable TV and camera products; micro inverters, hybrid inverters and systems, and energy storage devices; and outdoor lighting rugged and panel backlight drivers, as well as charger and power supplies, such as e-bike chargers. It has operations in Taiwan, Mainland China, Japan, Korea, the United States, the Czech Republic, the Netherlands, and Germany. The company was incorporated in 1997 and is headquartered in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.

8210.TW.summary: Chenbro Micom Co., Ltd. engages in the design, manufacture, processing, and trading of computer peripherals and systems. It offers barebone servers; rackmount, tower server, and PC chassis; storage expansion kit; and OEM/JDM services. The company is also involved in the software design activities; and export and import of computer products and peripherals. It operates in the United States, China, Taiwan, and internationally. The company was founded in 1983 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

8234.TWO.summary: NEXCOM International Co., Ltd. provides Internet of Things (IoT) automation solutions, intelligent platform and services, mobile computing solutions, network and communication solutions, intelligent digital security, and medical and healthcare informatics products worldwide. The company offers IoT automation solutions, such as industrial fanless computer, google cloud IoT ready solution, industrial wireless solution, industry firewall solution, IoT solution, industrial touch computer, machine automation, PC-based factory automation, and software solution; and smart system solutions, including AI accelerators, interactive signage solution packs, multimedia player application platforms, multimedia machine tablets, embedded computer, open frame tablets, TV wall digital electronic signage solutions, digital electronic signboard dedicated hardware platforms, point of sale terminals, and rack industrial computers. It also provides car computer suctions comprising AI edge telematics solutions, embedded add-on modules, mobile NVRs, car computers, car network equipment, car touch screen computers, rugged car displays, modular on-board computers, and railway computers. In addition, the company offers network communication solutions, including cyber security solutions, edge and cloud solutions, industrial gateway solutions, network peripheral solutions, and SoC capability and S/W services; and smart medical solutions, such as healthcare medical, IoT gateway, software package, and video conference system. Further, it provides intelligent monitoring solutions comprising 3D cameras, panoramic cameras, license plate recognition cameras, monitoring video platforms, and webcams; and smart system and movie and film solutions. NEXCOM International Co., Ltd. was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

8299.TWO.summary: Phison Electronics Corp. designs, manufactures, and sells flash memory controllers and peripheral system applications in Asia, the United States, Europe, Australia, and internationally. The company offers controllers and modules of SSD; controllers and modules of embedded flash used on portable applications; controllers and modules of USB; and controllers and modules of memory cards. It also designs, researches, develops, produces, sells, imports, and exports storage devices, integrated circuits, and systems and electronics hardware and software, as well as technical support services. In addition, the company manufactures and trades in electronic components. Further, it is involved in the investment activities. The company serves consumer, industrial, and enterprise markets. Phison Electronics Corp. was incorporated in 2000 and is headquartered in Miaoli, Taiwan.

9EL.F.summary: Elecom Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells personal computer and digital device related products worldwide. The company offers peripherals, I/O devices, and PC accessories, such as mouse pads, mice, and keyboards; tablet PCs and smartphones, as well as health care products, including body composition scales and electric therapy equipment; digital field products; network products, such as wireless LAN routers; audio visual device-related products; wearable products; and application development products, as well as cloud and installation services for wireless LAN access points. The company was incorporated in 1986 and is headquartered in Osaka, Japan.
